company: 美商網基股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: NLP Engineer
requirement: 關於美商網基 -  總部位於矽谷，美商網基是一家快速成長且充滿創業精神的公司。在全球社群媒體分析平台上, 我們處於世界領先地位, 每年達到30%以上的成長!   我們將網際網路上的資訊，如 Facebook 貼文、Instagram圖片、 YouTube留言、Twitter 等資訊，經由最尖端的自然語言處理技術(Natural Language Processing)及電腦視覺(Computer Vision)分析之後，轉化為能幫助客戶更快，更精準的做出商業決策的工具平台。   NetBase is looking for a NLP Engineer to join the Natural Language Processing/Computer Vision engineering group as part of the Artificial Intelligence Research & Development team.  The mission of the AI R&D team is to drive innovation in Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, and Data Science to surface insights from massive amounts of social media and survey data. We are delivering on the promise of AI-assisted analytics, earning a position as a leader in our space in a 2018 Forrester Wave report (https://pages.netbase.com/AR-2018-ForresterWave.html). Our customers recognize the value of our AI as well – watch this video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6HmmZPDSGU) to see leaders from iMAX, Visa, Chili’s, and GoDaddy rave about our work! We are currently building on that success with major new AI initiatives that will keep us on the cutting edge.  You will be part of diverse but cohesive group with complimentary skills that values continuous growth and learning. We support conference attendance and ongoing education, believing that our success depends on the career development of our team members. Team members are encouraged to spend 20% of their time on technical projects of their choice. We also provide an enjoyable working environment, with funded regular group activities, a budget for personal technical gear, and no need to work on compensating Saturdays.  On the NetBase AI R&D team you will build on a strong NLP architecture, with projects such as: •	Knowledge Graph development to support use cases such as concept-based analysis and disambiguation •	Research and implementation of cutting edge techniques for information extraction •	Development of NLP modules that can be offered as microservices to the rest of the data processing pipeline •	Architecture changes to support configurable models and analysis at the individual user level  RESPONSIBILITIES •	Contribute to code base for NLP pipeline including APIs, services, and libraries •	Collaborate with team members to develop creative solutions for product features relying on NLP  •	Identify innovative solutions to improve on NLP components and analysis  •	Focus on code scalability and efficiency to process large volumes of text data effectively •	Stay informed of new developments in NLP technologies and software packages and adopt them for our code base as appropriate •	Follow Agile development methodology  REQUIREMENTS •	2+ years software industry experience with a BS degree in Computer Science or related field (MS or PhD a plus) •	Experience contributing to NLP projects through full development and deployment cycle •	Experience in applying machine learning techniques to NLP •	Strong Java skills (C++ experience is a plus) •	Strong written and verbal English skills

Data Scientist 【Job Description】  ✦ Cooperate with solution architects and sales to understand and assess customer machine learning use cases ✦ Work with large, complex data sets. company: 精藤股份有限公司
title: 資料分析師
requirement: 精藤公司為【全家便利商店股份有限公司】之子公司，精藤做為集團資訊整合的中心，不但承擔著集團「系統整合」及「Know-How彙整」的責任，同時也扮演了集團最堅強的技術發展領航者及實踐者。  而支援這團隊成長的背後，除了穩定成長的零售通路資訊發展需求以外，亦包含了精藤20年來不斷精進的程式開發技術以及重視團隊合作的組織文化。  在精藤，除了可以學習各項資訊系統規劃、開發、監控與維護（如：物流管理系統、帳務管理系統、商品管理系統，與情報分析系統......等數以百計的資訊系統，精藤皆自行開發與維護），更有完善的公司治理與開發標準，可做為所有資訊人員執行專案時的後盾。  除此之外，精藤近年來亦不斷追求更多新領域的發展，例如：雲端科技應用、大數據資料分析以及行動裝置管理技術等等，誠摯的歡迎所有對於零售流通有興趣的伙伴一同加入精藤的大家庭。  本公司資料分析師之職務內容如下： 1. 協助集團發展銷售預測分析模型 2. 協助集團進行資料建模 3. 協助集團建置資料倉儲 4. 開發預測模型視覺化報表  此職缺需熟悉統計分析、SQL、Python、R語言、Machine Learning與SPSS，且具備資料分析2年以上工作經驗。誠摯歡迎符合以上條件，且具責任心、勇於接受挑戰者的加入。
requirement_others: 1. 需熟悉SQL、Python與R語言。 2. 需具備統計分析能力，包括熟悉SPSS、Multivariable calculus與Linear algebra。 3. 需熟悉Machine Learning，包括KNN、SVM、Clustering、Bayesian Natworks, Ensemble...。 4.需具備Data Visualization & communication能力。 5.須具備2年以上資料分析相關工作經驗。

company: 上準微流體股份有限公司
title: Software Engineer (Front-End)
requirement: At MiCareo, we are working on an innovative medical instrument for detecting rare cells in blood sample. That means that out of the 5 billion cells there are in 1 mL of blood, we are able to detect the very single cell that may give doctors crucial information about their patient. An important application for this technology is developing better treatments to fight against cancer : it allows doctors and researchers to identify precisely the different types of cancer and know what treatment will work for the patient.   Our system includes a web-based user interface that researchers can use to look at the cells from their blood samples and perform some analysis. We are now looking for a software engineer who will be in charge of designing and implementing a new and improved interface that would allow our users to do much more.  Tasks include : - Design the User Experience, translate user needs into usable functionality - Implementation of the front-end of the application using a SPA framework  - Solutions for fast loading or caching of images and numerical data - Fast and interactive data-visualization  It is expected that all members of the team go beyond their responsibilities and help to improve the whole project: - Help improving the global software design (Take an active part in the whole software design process) - Come up with great ideas, new solutions to existing problems or completely new features - Eventually help other engineers on their projects, such as : back-end programming, software and data integration, instrument automatic control, image algorithms, data analysis, etc...  Requirements : - HTML, CSS, Javascript - Experience with Bootstrap or an other similar framework - Experience with SPA frameworks such as Vue.js, Angular, React, etc... - Experience designing the user experience for a complex application
requirement_others: Experience and interest in one or multiple of the following would be considered a plus : - Experience using D3.js or other data visualization libraries for Javascript - Back-end development using a framework such as Spring in Java for example - Experience with SQL or NoSQL database - Automated software testing, continuous integration - Software Documentation writing and Software certifications (ISO, IEEE, FDA, ...) - Data analysis and machine learning ; Image processing - Shell scripting and system administration on Unix and/or Windows - Cellular Biology

title: Machine Learning Scientist
requirement: [About Vpon] 我們利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，進而建立數據產品 (Data Products)，將其應用在廣告投放，電商成效優化、O2O 等各種領域。  [About Data Science Team] 我們是一群由電腦科學家、統計學家和心理學家等跨領域組成的數據科學團隊 (Data Science Team)，深信著 “Data Drives Transactions”。  團隊的發展重點為廣告競價平台 (Real-Time Bidding Demand-Side Platform) 、數據管理平台 (Data Management Platform)，團隊的使命是幫助企業提升顧客終生價值 (Customer Lifetime Value)。  [About Job] •	Lead the definition of feasible problems and reasonable measuring ways to drive business solutions •	Partner closely with business and engineering teams to collect requirements, and provide assessment or suggestion •	Develop user behavior predictive models with valuable findings from large-scale datasets, especially in the field of traveling related problems •	Prototype and build machine learning pipelines to accelerate development life cycle •	Demonstrate data visualizations with clear presentations of insights and business recommendations •	Research machine learning techniques and optimization methods based on multi-source data to improve the quality of DMP product  [About You] •	MS/PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Math, Physics, Engineering, or equivalent experience •	Excellent understanding of machine learning or statistical data analysis in theory and applications •	Strong collaboration skills with software and DevOps engineers to build production-level products •	Applied experience with handling and analyzing large-scale datasets •	Experience with at least one modeling framework such as R, Scikit Learn, TensorFlow, or Keras •	Expertise in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java •	Fluency in SQL-like programming languages •	Experience in Hadoop ecosystem such as Spark, Hive •	Experience with cloud services such as AWS or GCP is a plus •	Knowledge and experience in deep learning models is a plus

requirement: DevOps是一個多元專業的角色，能夠充分使用三把刀進行戰鬥，也就是包含研發、測試、維運展現三刀流的戰力，替整個開發團隊打通任督二脈，化繁為簡，以簡馭繁，強化開發團隊的設計遠見、促進軟體系統運作效率。[Job Content]  DevOps is a kind of architect who can oversee the large scale cloud infrastructure. You will join design discussion with R&D teams about Cloud services and fully utilize the advantage of infrastructure to maintain the service availability. Regarding a large scale cloud design, your opinion is crucial that ensure the infrastructure is scalable, maintainable and measurable. 1. Manage service availability and scalability through better monitoring, processes, and infrastructure.2. Collect infrastructure and application metrics to solve problem 10x faster and improve application performance. 3. Develop tools and automation to minimize delivery time and increase developer productivity. 4. Advise in the design and development of evolving services, architecture, and performance standards.5. For delivering solution, to design, implement, and operate the backend infrastructure and in-the-cloud service which are about large, fast, and robust.6. Analyze web threat & prototype the solution.[Challenge/Achievement/Growth] ● 在趨勢科技，DevOps能隨時掌握世界技術的最新動態!不管是否曾經聽過、看過，DevOps透過虛擬團隊的會議討論這些最新、最流行的技術應用，找尋未來應用的可能性！● 在趨勢科技，DevOps能累積各種專業領域的技術與經驗！不論是系統開發，自動化部署流程建置、監控系統維運或是雲端服務和資料庫的技術，DevOps都可藉由不同專案的歷練，習得十八般武藝，進而奠定成為 Cloud System Engineer、Site Reliability Engineer、Solution Architect、Security Solution Architect的基石，發揮在各式環境中對於資訊安全的敏感度和預防潛在威脅的技術力。[Related Team/Project/Product]● Core Tech teams (Web Reputation Service (WRS), Email Reputation Service (ERS), File Reputation Service (FRS))● Consumer Web Engineering Service team (WSE)● Consumer Home Network Security (Diamond)● Consumer Cloud VPN Platform (Yamato)● Consumer IoT Security (Atom)

requirement: 本職位主要負責研華機器視覺產品的技術支援，產品內容包括: 1.研華ICAM智能相機機器視覺應用解決方案 2.研華PC-based機器視覺應用解決方案 職務內容: 1. 產品全球技術支持 協助客戶處理機器視覺相關產品應用問題，提供應用範例或文件並教導客戶使用產品，另針對特定整合專案提供事前咨詢以及事後產品技術支援。 2. 分析、解決產品問題 透過全球FAE回饋現場資訊，複製現場客戶應用問題後進行分析，與產品部RD合作解決問題。 3. 新產品測試 新產品研發階段，以客戶角度進行產品應用面評估測試，在使用者友善介面及特殊軟硬體應用，提供產品部建議，增強產品使用者友善功能。 4. 產品教育訓練 不定期提供國內外合作Partner及內部同仁產品訓練課程。 5. 國內On-site客戶拜訪以及技術支援 不定期前往應用現場，了解客戶機器視覺專案上的需求以及提供專業技術的建議/支援。
requirement_others: 1. 熟悉或具機器視覺系統開發相關經驗二年以上優先錄取 2. 熟悉C/C++/C#中至少一種程式語言 3. 學歷: 大學(含)以上, 電子/電機/機械/資訊相關科系畢業. 4. 具工業自動化產品使用經驗者佳 5. 人際互動及溝通協調能力強，並具服務熱忱 6. 具備中上英文溝通能力

company: 聯瞻資訊股份有限公司
title: 軟體開發工程師/網頁開發工程師
requirement: 聯瞻上班時間為AM10:00-PM19:00，我們提供友善的工作環境，非責任制；就算真的為了趕專案需要加班(頻率很低)，也請一定要申請加班費或補休！一切皆符合勞基法規定！  以下說明為此職缺的工作內容，但如果您技術經驗尚未成熟但對新技術充滿熱忱，期待全方位的成長；而不是單純坐在辦公室Coding及跟PM吵架，做小螺絲釘的工作；歡迎您跟我們聯絡。  基本技術要求 1.	Linux 基本操作 2.	基本資料庫指令概念 3.	基本程式能力(C/C++, Java, Python, PHP, Javascript, Node.js, Spark任一皆可) 4.     樂於團隊合作及共同分享技術新知。  5.     喜歡嘗試新技術，並能思考如何應用在現行專案中。   工作內容 主要使用工具：ELK(Node.js), Nagios(PHP and Mysql), Hadoop(Spark), Linux(Shell Script) -	建置Nagios, ELK及大數據分析專案。 -	可協助整合性專案作業進行。 -	可協助客製化產品開發。  * 犯錯沒關係，成長才是最重要的(不過事不過三哦~)。  * 我們是個年輕的團隊(絕對不是一言堂!)，期望在互相討論及自由的管理方式下，建立每個員工與公司最佳的合作模式，互相成長。  * 聯瞻有堅強專業技術及行銷團隊作為後盾，提供創新獨特全方位資訊顧問服務；基於目前的產品，我們也期望激發出更多創意，運用公司資源建立出更多符合客戶需求的產品。  * 我們深知沒有技術背景的PM會為RD造成多大的困擾，因此本公司提供全方位的訓練；我們重視技術人才的培養與未來發展，讓工程師不僅能增進專業技術能力，從生動的簡報製作到、客戶訪談及專案管控的過程中，都有辦法獨當一面。
requirement_others: *具備Open Source開發經驗者 佳 *熟悉Hadoop、Spark或Elasticsearch者 佳 *具有資料探勘、統計分析、機器學習等相關經驗 佳

requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。  因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。 從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。  培訓方式： 初階訓練－店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。 完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。 進階訓練－依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。 結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~12家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。 區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。  長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。 工作時間：培訓期間為三班輪班輪休制，結訓後依職務調整出勤時間。
requirement_others: 1.具服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

Develop an organization responsive to changing the environment by keeping employees, motivated, innovative and committed.

requirement: Silkrode Ads is a start-up company that makes it easy for businesses to use artificial intelligence to grow and succeed in a cross screen era. . Silkrode Ads is formed by a passionate team of computer scientists and engineers with experience in AI, data analysis, distributed systems, and marketing.  We make it easy for businesses to use artificial intelligence to grow and succeed in a cross screen era. We provide professional transnational corporate Internet information security application platform and consulting experience. Analyzing user experience with AI data to provide our customers. Our independent R&D center in Taiwan to placed great emphasis on increasing competitiveness of customers via stable, high-speed and security software services, as our ultimate mission.  •	Natural Language Processing: industrial domain word segmentation, part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition; industrial domain knowledge map construction;  •	Experience in NoSQL database (Mongo, Cassandra, Memcached, etc.)  •	Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: GLM/Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis, etc.  •	Experience with data visualization tool like Tableau is good. •	Experience in any of AWS/Azure cloud servcie is a plus. •	Experience in deep learning methdologies or frameworks is a big plus. •	Experience in deep neural networks (CNN, RNN, BNN, TWN) is a big plus.
requirement_others: •	Education: levels/ majors: Bachelors degree in Computer Sciences,Mathmiatics, Engineering, Statistics or equivalent. •	Work experience: At least 2-3 years hands on experience in data science field. •	Familiar with data analysis process is a must. •	Familiar with at least one of the following data analysis languages: Python, R, Matlab, Java, Scala, C/C++ •	Familiar with any of RDBMS (ex: MySQL , SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle Database, etc.) is a must. •	Familiar with Big Data open source software such as Hadoop and Spark, and Data Visualization is good •	Familiar with Hadoop ecosystem, such as Spark, Hive,Impala is a big plus •	Familiar with at least one of deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, and so on is a big plus.

requirement: As a member of our Software Engineering Group you will dive head-first into creating innovative solutions that advance businesses and careers. You’ll join an inspiring and curious team of technologists dedicated to improving the design, analytics, development, coding, testing and application programming that goes into creating high quality software and new products. You’ll be tasked with keeping the team and other key stakeholders up to speed on the progress of what’s being developed. Coming in with an understanding of the importance of end-to-end software development-such as Agile frameworks-is key. And best of all, you’ll be working with and sharing ideas, information and innovation with our global team of technologists from all over the world.  Our Asset and Wealth Management division is driven by innovators like you who are driven to create technology solutions that make us work more efficiently and help our businesses grow. It’s our mission to efficiently take care of our clients’ wealth, helping them get, and remain properly invested.  Across 27 cities, our team of 4,600 agile technologists thrive in a cloud-native environment that values continuous learning using a data-centric approach in developing innovative technology solutions.  When you work at JPMorgan Chase & Co., you’re not just working at a global financial institution. You’re an integral part of one of the world’s biggest tech companies. In 14 technology hubs worldwide, our team of 40,000+ technologists design, build and deploy everything from enterprise technology initiatives to big data and mobile solutions, as well as innovations in electronic payments, cybersecurity, machine learning, and cloud development. Our $9.5B+ annual investment in technology enables us to hire people to create innovative solutions that will not only transform the financial services industry, but also change the world.

title: 計量研究與交易員 Quantitative Researchers & Traders
requirement: KRONOS專注於加密貨幣交易市場的金融科技（FinTech）公司。我們熱情歡迎頂尖人才加入我們充滿創造與活力的台北團隊!  身為 KRONOS 計量研究與交易員，您能在對沖基金及計量金融的菁英世界中獲得無與倫比的洞見，您將開發關於計量研究、風險管理以及執行交易等基礎建設，並且處理多種資產層級與各式策略 (從基本策略到高頻策略) 以及研究開發各種投資組合中的 Alpha 。若您具有出色天分，您將會在短時間內受益於公司扁平化組織帶來的成長，並且您的績效獎勵完全取決於您的貢獻與價值!  We are not just another company. You are not just another applicant. Those with top-notch creativity and logical reasoning abilities, those who dare to think they can change this world and those who seek the truth no matter the hours or the difficulty – you are strongly encouraged to apply.  As a KRONOS Quant, you will gain valuable insights into the elite world of hedge funds and quantitative trading by developing risk/research and execution infrastructure to handle various asset classes and strategies (from high frequency to fundamental) and can research and develop alphas.  For talented quants, you will be able to advance rapidly as we have a flat organization and rewards are based solely on merit.  KRONOS leverages more than a decade of successful trading experience at the world’s most elite trading institutions (Citadel Securities, Tower Research, Virtu) to democratize access to the quantitative hedge fund space. This is your chance to work with some of the world’s most talented quantitative trading talent without having to move overseas.

company: 中國信託綜合證券股份有限公司
title: 大數據分析師
requirement: 以量化觀點洞悉人類行為是我們的核心信念。  在這份工作你能同時處理大量客戶及金融資料，保持靈活思維隨時切換不同角度來挖掘數據中尚未被發現的寶藏。並且直接將其轉化為有用的分析或預測模型。  歡迎正在等待空間大展身手，渴望資料來進行實戰解決問題的高手。來一同打造以數據為核心的Data Culture。 -------------------------------------------------------------------- 工作內容： 1.共同討論業務端需求及模型目的，找出可實用之商業價值 2.預測模型開發建置及優化 3.特徵工程與資料轉置(Data wrangling) 4.客戶資料分析及關鍵指標建立 5.資料視覺化呈現
requirement_others: 必備技能&條件： 1.具備R程式語言或Python程式開發相關經驗2年以上 2.具備資料轉置能力(R: dplyr/data.table  Python: pandas/numpy …etc) 3.具備Machine Learning/Deep Learning專業知識 4.有實務ML/DL模型開發建置經驗(論文或實際作品) 5.熟悉圖表視覺化套件(ggplot2/matplotlib) 6.具備良好商業邏輯能力 7.統計及資工背景尤佳 8.若有Kaggle競賽成績將優先面談 ------------------------------------ 加分技能： 1.熟tensorflow/pytorch 2.熟悉Hadoop環境(HDFS/Hive/Impala) 3.推薦系統建置經驗或Time Series Data處理經驗 4.了解基本證券買賣邏輯 5.快速解決問題能力

requirement: 【部門說明】 本部門主要工作在開發先進的製程技術與設計自動化生產設備與製造管理系統，會應用到機電光整合的知識、精密的感測器技術、物聯網與大數據分析的技巧。 在這裡工作可以學習到: - 工業4.0 未來趨勢，研究IoT與雲端開發與大數據應用，深度了解資料儲存與訊息溝通 - 影像處理與光學檢查技術 - 垂直整合完整的工廠流程，讓你一次在台灣了解工廠生態鏈  - 機器手臂應用，實現工廠自動化 - 開發生產管理系統，結合大數據，邁向智慧製造 - 與國外同事共同合作，拓展國際視野    【工作範圍】 自動化 1. 生產與測試設備系統開發與整合 2. 機構設計 3. 電控與機電整合 4. 機器手臂的應用  系統整合 1. company: 台達電子工業股份有限公司 _DELTA ELECTRONICS INC.
title: Senior Software Engineer(Backend)(E4E)_台達研究院(台北)
requirement: Established in 2013, Delta Research Center (DRC) is devoted to big data analytics as well as the development and integration of applications and solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT) to enable the acceleration of enterprise transformation and upgrade. Meanwhile, DRC takes an open collaboration approach to actively collaborate with partners from industrial sectors, government agencies, academia, and research institutions for the mutual success of ecosystem.   As a senior software engineer, you will play a key role in the design and development of our Cyber-Physical System for Smart Learning. The qualified candidate will contribute to build the next-generation solution of Education for Enterprise that elevates learning effectiveness through the use of hardware-software integration, human-computer interaction, immersive technologies, and learning analytics. We are looking for self-motivated, detail-oriented and skillful talent to join our team and make things happen.  Our development primarily uses Java and relevant open-source libraries. Experiences with these tools are highly preferred, but above all, we value your desire to learn, understand new things and to work with others as part of a team.   Responsibilities: -	Design and implement short and long-term strategic goals for managing software -	Design and build APIs leveraged for the in-house online learning platform. -	Analyze and enhance the performance of the code base; make recommendations for improving the systems. -	Deploy system to production, build security mechanism, and monitor service health. -	Mentor junior and mid-level engineers.
requirement_others: Minimum Qualification: -	MS/BS in Computer Science or equivalent. -	3 years of practical experience developing Java system using Spring MVC, Tomcat server, Restful and JSON web services. -	Solid knowledge of SQL and NoSQL database (MySQL / MongoDB / etc.) design concepts and practices. -	Experience with Unix/Linux, Nginx and bash script. -	Working familiarity with the entire software development lifecycle. -	Experience with test automation frameworks and CI/CD pipelines. -	Experience developing web or mobile applications. -	Strong communication, critical thinking, and problem solving skills. -	Excellent team player.  Preferred Qualification: -	Experience with services development in a large scale environment. -	Experience with our tech stack: machine learning, analytics, microservices, frontend development (ES6 and React/Redux), and AWS services (EC2, S3, ELB, SQS, and CDN). -	Passion for constantly learning emerging technologies.

requirement: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer 在 Pinkoi 將負責挖掘、研究和分析平台上所有的數據，並使用統計、機器學習、資料探勘等相關技術，幫助平台解決各種有挑戰性的問題。這工作可能挑戰除了針對問題挖掘資料、提出洞見、設計實驗驗證假設，也會和其他 Engineers 與 UI/UX Designers 一起協同開發。在各種專案中，讓數據帶來的價值最大化，例如： 1. 各個頁面的推薦系統版面：商品、設計館推薦，提高好商品與設計館的曝光；媒合買家與合適的商品，更主動地提供買家可能會喜歡的商品 2. 搜尋引擎的改善：關鍵詞推薦、自動補全、更好的商品排序機制，使得使用者更有效率地找到有興趣的商品 3. 跨語言的資料分析與處理：Pinkoi 目前提供簡繁中文、英文、日文、泰文等不同語系內容，各有不同的挑戰 4. 其他 data-driven 的系統，使得平臺更智慧化  如果你覺得你現在列的挑戰不夠的話。Pinkoi 具有來自多個國家的使用者、商品、商家資料。有包含電腦版網站、手機版網站與 App 操作紀錄。跨語言、跨文化、跨平台，挑戰多到數不完。  【我們希望你有的經驗跟特質】  1. 對於設計指標、挖掘使用者行爲、分析資料，設計實驗來驗證假設有極大興趣 2. 熱愛使用程式與數學建立聰明的自動化系統 3. 能獨立閱讀相關研究，有相關數學與工程背景知識來學習各種演算法原理與模型，了解如何選擇與正確使用 4. 要有良好的溝通能力，你要能夠清晰的解釋自己數據分析出來的原理和結果 5. 樂於學習最新的技術，隨時充實自我的專業技能
requirement_others: 【應徵條件】  1. 具備三年以上的 Data Science、Machine Learning Engineering 工作經驗 2. 具有 Recommendation System、Data Mining、Information Retrieval、Natural Language Processing、Machine Learning、Statistics Analysis 等其中至少一種背景知識與研究經驗 3. 熟悉設計指標、設計模型訓練資料集、建立模型與驗證模型效益 4. 具備 data-driven 自動化系統設計經驗，上線後能穩定運作、容易維護，應變外在的環境與資料變動 5. 成熟的 programming 能力與處理 big data 的能力，能獨立作業  【不用想了，趕快來當個 Pinkoi 人】  欲應徵者，請在 104 履歷表的作品集或自我推薦信欄位附上以下資訊，未附上者，概不受理：   1. 你的個人作品 (GitHub、網站 link 或其他作品介紹資料) 2. 分享你的挖掘、分析 data、建立 Machine Learning/AI 系統使用的技術、演算法及結果的經驗

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

company: 上準微流體股份有限公司
title: Software Engineer
requirement: At MiCareo, we are working on an innovative medical instrument for detecting rare cells in blood sample. That means that out of the 5 billion cells there are in 1 mL of blood, we are able to detect the very single cell that may give doctors crucial information about their patient. An important application for this technology is developing better treatments to fight against cancer : it allows doctors and researchers to identify precisely the different types of cancer and know what treatment will work for the patient.   Our solution includes multiple components distributed on different computers. We are now looking for a software engineer to help us improve the integration and deployment of those components and implement a reliable software to synchronize data between the different computers.   Tasks include: - Develop software for automatic transfer and synchronization of large data between two computers - Develop software for managing the interface between different modules written in different languages (Labview, Python, Java)  and located on different computers - Implement tools for software deployment and system configuration - Implement tool for Improving our development process (automated tests, CI/CD, ...)   It is expected that all members of the team go beyond their responsibilities and help to improve the whole project: - Help improving the global software design (Take an active part in the whole software design process) - Come up with great ideas, new solutions to existing problems or completely new features - Eventually help other engineers on their projects, such as : web programming, instrument automatic control, image algorithms, data analysis, etc...   Requirements: - Good knowledge of software engineering and design patterns - Object Oriented Programming (experience with Java is preferred)  - Experience with Continuous Integration and Deployment (using Jenkins for example) and/or installation software  - System administration and scripting for Windows and/or Linux
requirement_others: Experience and interest in one or multiple of the following would be considered a plus : - Scripting and programming using Python - System security - Web programming - Software Documentation writing and Software certifications (ISO, IEEE, FDA, ...) - Data analysis and machine learning ; Image processing - Cellular Biology

title: AI Software Engineer ( Engineer~Sr Engineer level) (E1970589)
requirement: Job Overview: Do you want to work in the biggest emerging field of technology since the birth of the Internet? Machine learning is going to change EVERYTHING. We are rapidly expanding our AI Enablement Center in Taiwan.  This lab will join a large number of other AI R&D labs around the world.  We invite you to join our new lab to apply your skills to expand Qualcomms already impressive AI portfolio, with a special focus on IoT applications and devices.  We combine high performance software with cutting edge hardware to run deep neural nets fast, and we do it with the lowest power on our incredible range of Snapdragon processors. In this position you will be responsible for enabling advanced machine learning usage scenarios on top of Qualcomms hardware and software infrastructure. You will work with neural network frameworks like Caffe and TensorFlow, extend our neural net engine to support the latest and greatest DNNs emerging from the research community, and optimize for next generation hardware acceleration cores. You will also validate the performance and accuracy of the engine through detailed analysis and test coverage. Live and breathe software development with excellent analytical, development, and debugging skills and partner with industry-leading organizations for delivering next generation of machine learning technology into the hands of millions.
requirement_others: Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.  2+ years Software Engineering or related work experience. Good experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, PyTorch etc.     Preferred Qualifications: 2-5 years of software experience within the wireless, telecommunications or semiconductor industry. IoT experience or devices (home speaker, security camera, etc) experience. Good C/C++ skills and embedded programming skills. Experience in Linux/Android software development in both user space and kernel space. System level issues debugging with JTAG or gdb tool. Expertise in at least one of the following areas: o DSP software development and algorithm implementation. o OpenCL programming and debugging.  o Performance profiling and optimization for parallel computing.  o Image processing, computer vision, and object/face detection specially. Enthusiasm in machine learning technology. Hand-on experience in design/implementation of deep learning networks via modern frameworks, including TensorFlow, Caffe, etc.  Ability to quickly learn new technologies and work on resolving customer reported technical problems during mobile or wireless communication product development cycles. Excellent analytical, problem solving and Communication skills and willingness to work with customers

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

company: Google_美商科高國際有限公司
title: Software Engineer, Engineering Productivity, Pixel Modem - New Taipei City
requirement: Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related technical field or equivalent practical experience. Experience with algorithms, data structures, complexity analysis, and software design. Experience in one or more of the following: C, C++, Java, Python, Go.  Preferred qualifications: Experience with wireless technologies such as CDMA, E-HRPD, GSM, UMTS, TDS-CDMA, LTE, and 5G. Experience with developing and deploying software system and whole machine learning pipeline. Experience with TCP/IP networking (DNS, DHCP, etc) troubleshooting. Interest and ability to learn other coding languages as needed. Interest in designing, analyzing, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems. Ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks.  About the job Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.  As a Software Engineer on Engineering Productivity, you will develop the whole software stack for Pixel modem developing system, including modem log processing, analysis, issue diagnosis system. You will also develop and deploy machine learning processing pipeline and machine learning algorithm. Much of our software development focuses on building and optimizing systems, building infrastructure and eliminating work through automation and machine learning.  Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices & Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices & Services team is making people's lives better through technology.  Responsibilities Develop the whole software stack for pixel modem developing. Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software and machine learning system.

requirement: I.	Job Description: To manage and operate LS business, this role is not only in charge of LS solution selling to business units and divisions within Dimension Data and external clients /partners but also manage the LS operation and provide one stop service from the deal beginning to the deal closing with coordinating the share support team within Dimension Data Taiwan.  II.	Responsibility 1.	Ensure client satisfaction   Able to build relationships with clients and display an interest in and knowledge of the client environment. Provide the excellent client experience through the execution of predefined work objectives as per agreed standard operating procedures. 2.	Identify Sales Opportunities Identify opportunities for up-selling of training solutions and services to internal and external clients and to process sales transactions accurately and timeously. They have superior telephonic communication skills and display telephone etiquette and equipped with sufficient IT knowledge. 3.	Manage resources Responsible to manage country resources such as training facilities and locally deployed training instructors. Work closely with clients to identify and quantify resource requirements in terms of people, skills sets and equipment in order to meet client expectations. Manage the training instructors’ schedules and training laboratory bookings to ensure the availability of resources in line with pre-determined training calendars and plans based on client demand including deciding on the type of delivery and the use of 3rd party vendors if applicable. Coordinate with the share function supports within Dimension Data to ensure the efficient management of day-to-day operations. 4.	Contribute to Sales Identify and implement commercial business solutions through assisting the sales team in sales engagements and consulting with clients through the detailed knowledge of the client’s requirements to offer solutions that will meet the client’s demand. Creating selling kits and developing marketing and communication programs to promote services to the sales team within DD, clients, and partners. Also determining the local pricing structure for all training programs. 5.	Relationship management Developing and maintaining professional relationships with a variety of stakeholders. Represent LS to develop and manage alliances for resource supply within the divisions and from third party organizations. 6.	Financial management Maintaining effective control of the LS business according to financial and operational metrics as determined during the budgeting process. Manage LS P&L by ensuring optimal resource utilization and develop, refine and co-ordinate efficient services delivery and operations processes. Ensure clients are billed according to the planned charges and ensure compliance to the procedure to purchase processes within the business.  III.	Behavioral Skill and required experience: 1.	Strong service orientation aptitude towards ensuring client satisfaction and service delivery. Reliable and accountable, displaying good attention to detail and able to manage work processes.  2.	With good business acumen coupled with strong resource management, scheduling and execution skills.  3.	Demonstrate good verbal and written communication skills. 4.	Excellent interpersonal skills and can interact with a variety of internal and external stakeholders across all levels in the organization 5.	Demonstrate effective client engagement skills 6.	Solutions driven and focused on achieving outputs 7.	Experience in providing Consultation services and delivering presentations

requirement: 從全面委外到自建集團營運的所有IT，這中間的過程從資訊基礎建設、門市POS導入、ERP導入、前後端系統串聯，再到已升級新一代記憶體式ERP系統SAP HANA，甚至是已建置的商業智慧系統，這是金色三麥資訊處所打造的營運IT架構。  我們的營運IT架構應用範圍從生產工廠、IOT、物流配送、集團簽核表單電子化，再到門市e化營運，甚至是會員系統，未來IT的應用場景，IOT、Big Data、Machine Learning…，這裡都在進行中。   你是一個滿腹創新想法的資訊人嗎? 是需要一個舞台來發揮應用嗎?  歡迎充滿IT應用熱忱的次世代資訊人，成為我們的夥伴!  1. 服務金色三麥集團所有事業體業務、中央工廠、總部後勤人員資訊作業問題 2. 新功能建置(EIP/SAP/BI)與現行應用系統修改、問題排除、優化。 3. 企業流程討論、規劃、設計與開發應用系統。 4. 協助集團進行系統整合開發(POS、SAP、EIP、MES)。   工作經驗:  1. 具企業應用整合專案(EIP, MES)開發經驗 2. 具企業SAP開發維護經驗(ABAP/MM/SD/FI等相關模組)

company: OK超商_來來超商股份有限公司
title: 儲備幹部(汐止區)
requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。   培訓方式： 初階訓練： 店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。  進階訓練： 依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~10家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.具服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

company: 萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
title: 外商 - 軟體服務業 - Modern Classroom Experience Solution Sales Professional - 105IW
requirement: People can do remarkable things when technology is within reach. This is the founding principle on which Microsoft was launched. Core to our mission is empowering every person and organization to achieve more. We do this in Education by creating immersive and inclusive experiences that inspire a lifelong interest in learning, as well as stimulating the development of essential life skills  By supporting education system leaders, school/institution leaders, researchers and educators to guide and nurture students' passions to achieve their potential, Microsoft offers educators the best tools to do their job, ensuring that anything and everything is possible in the classroom and their institution. To achieve this enabling Digital Transformation in education is not just a company priority, it’s a core company mandate.  Responsibility • Understand the customers’ priorities and strategies, and plan programs of services that drive value and contribute to Microsoft growth through attainment of your revenue based, share based and/or consumption-based quota  • Own opportunity pipeline and drive share for Microsoft Modern Classroom solutions within managed accounts by setting and achieving monthly sales forecasts • Deliver classroom transformation and success through accelerated adoption and usage resulting in customer references that can be leveraged in future sales engagements • Drive competitive direction, insight and strategy to proactively win new business and share through Microsoft’s differentiated value in education.  • Identify customer business challenges and bring them to agreement on the business value of the Modern Classroom solutions - including detailed relevant industry use cases, financial analysis such as Total Cost of Ownership & Return on Investment  • Own opportunities from start to close by orchestrating an extensive virtual team consisting of technical and partner roles across an extensive portfolio of products • Orchestrate the completion of a successful Customer Success Plan in all new opportunities before opportunity is closed to drive deployment and usage • Foster and expand Microsoft’s relationships with School Business Decision Makers and alleviate sales team blockers to evaluation, contracting, deployment and usage  • Proactively plan and manage Proof of Concept projects that drive customer objectives, outcomes and success creating lighthouse examples of digital transformation through seminars, workshops, webinars and direct engagement  • Support large and managed 1:1 device & Azure deals via proactive engagement with Ministries of Education, education foundations and channel partners • Support local device, deployment and training partners and ensure they are trained on the value of Azure, Windows 10, Intune for Education and Office 365. Collaborate with channel partners to ensure devices from global and local OEM’s are available at the right price points and configurations for your market • Partner with other roles to ensure customer success in the acquisition, implementation, and consumption of Microsoft’s services and solutions • Act as a primary contact for the customer, and serve as an escalation point when required leveraging voice of customer feedback through surveys, listening systems and social mechanisms to identify and alleviate key customer success blockers • Providing insight and feedback from customers and partners to the Microsoft Worldwide Industry Teams to help learning and improvement in industry solutions and digital transformation offerings • Remain focused on customer facing time by running a predictable and healthy business maintaining rigorous sales process compliance • Participate in internal Microsoft sales communities and in the broader industry through events, yammer, community gatherings and more. • Continuously nurture and expand your sales, industry, technology and competitive knowledge and capabilities
requirement_others: Experiences Required - Education, Key Experiences, Skills and Knowledge: • Strong solution sales background, with 1-4 years of technology-related experience, with experience in immersive and inclusive learning experiences, Online Productivity tools, Azure, Windows, mobility and devices  • Bachelor’s degree with exposure to Information Technology (or equivalent) is required; MBA is preferred • Ability to learn quickly, adapt and master new concepts and technologies to be able to impact their adoption and usage  • Possess executive maturity, presence and experience in building trust with education business decision makers articulating and demonstrating Microsoft and partner solution value propositions, with specific emphasis on solutions related to immersive and inclusive learning experiences. • Ability to drive digital transformation in a highly competitive environment with proven ability to successfully anticipate market changes to drive industry-relevant solutions, with an understanding of competitive technologies to address competitive threats and navigate complex customer environments • Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs  Join us as an Education Solution Specialist and be one who empowers billions and helps to enable digital transformation with all education customers worldwide!

requirement_others: 1. 碩士(含)以上，數學/資訊/電機相關系所畢業，具團隊合作精神，溝通能力強、抗壓性高2. 具以下專業知識(一項或多項)：reinforcement learning、NLP、人工智慧、Data Mining、Machine Learning、Deep Learning、雲端運算平台如GCP, AWS, Azure。3. 熟悉Linux平台與以下語言(一項或多項)：Python, C++, C#, Java程式開發，具平行運算、spark、ELK、Kubernetes開發實務經驗，了解DevOps與敏捷開發尤佳。*請檢附相當於TOEIC 650分之英語測驗成績證明(具英語系國家學歷或正式工作經歷者可免)，如無法提供，將安排參加本院英文檢測。
address: 新竹縣竹東鎮中興路四段195號51館
benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

benefit: [具激勵性之獎酬制度] ● 年終獎金 ● 營運績效獎金 ● 專利獎金(研發) ● 順暢升遷管道  [快樂職場、美化人生(公司設施與活動) ] ● 健身房／韻律教室／哺乳室 ● 各種名人、音樂、藝術、健康講座／藝文走廊 ● 歡樂家庭日活動／運動會／尾牙旺年會 ● 多元社團活動（鐵馬社／籃球社／瑜珈社／羽球社/Zumba社…） ● 附設餐廳供應多樣飲食／便利商店（廠區） ● 生日、三節禮品／旅遊補助或購物金6000元（年資1年以上） ● 結婚、生育、喪葬補助／急難、社團補助／ 電腦課程補助／子女獎學金補助 ● 公司產品、輔銷品員購優惠／特約商店／兩廰院藝文優惠票／端午.中秋.年貨大街  [人性化管理與服務(公司制度與服務) ] ● 彈性上、下班（總公司） ● 產檢假／陪產假／生理假／特休假／家庭照顧假 ● 健康諮詢／員工年度健檢／團保／眷屬醫療保險優惠方案 ● 差旅諮詢服務／銀行代辦服務／電信諮詢及代辦服務 ● 薪資戶跨行提款與轉帳免手續費  [重視人才發展之學習] ● 新進人員教育訓練：引導新進同仁快速融入技嘉大家庭 ● 管理職能教育訓練：針對各階層主管規劃系列課程，強化管理職能 ● 核心職能教育訓練：培育應具備之共通能力及共識 ● 語文訓練：補助語文進修課程，提昇國際化能力 ● 外訓課程：補助外部訓練課程，獲得業界新資訊與技術 ● E-Learning：不受時空限制，自由選讀課程 ● 技嘉書房（線上圖書系統）  [基金會簡介] 依據技嘉科技公司使命『創新科技、美化人生』籌設之『技嘉教育基金會』，於九十一年三月十五日通過教育部申請設立審查，獲準成立，以推動科技教育、藝術人文、美化人生、創造和諧進步之社會為發展宗旨。期透過推動科技教育、創新、藝術人文、關懷弱勢等活動，落實企之業回饋社會理念。並引導同仁參與志願服務工作，進而讓我們所處的社群，因技嘉人的參與而更美好。

requirement: 本公司為第三方數據服務領導品牌，整合多方 Data Partner 資料並利用大數據 / AI / 語意分析技術，建構《PeopleView 人群資料庫》，提供企業人群描繪資料用以深化會員資料庫、會員溝通優化；同時亦將資料應用於精準廣告人群定向，為企業、廣告投放夥伴優化廣告成效，並成為 Google DoubleClick、The Trade Desk重要的數據合作伙伴。為持續精進產品與服務品質，找尋並培育數據+科技+行銷 跨領域人才，共同建構具技術與市場影響力的數據產品。 工作內容: 1. 運用資料處理能力(資料處理、資料清理、格式與內容轉換…等)與分析能力(資料視覺化、統計檢定/分析、機器學習/深度學習…等)進行產品品質提升建議、除錯、或產品應用報告產出 2. 運用 Machine Learning/Deep Learning 工具，建構產品分析功能模組 3. 設計資料實驗方法、實驗步驟，並執行相關實驗，以提升產品價值 4. 跨部門溝通(RD單位)與管理/執行各項產品開發流程
requirement_others: 特質- 學習能力強 態度積極認真負責 可適應快速變動的環境 具團隊精神且溝通能力佳 思考縝密具有架構性 其他能力- 具備統計與數據分析能力 具備基本資料處理程式語言能力佳(Python/R) 具數位廣告相關經驗佳 有產品規畫經驗佳

company: 台灣康寧顯示玻璃股份有限公司
title: Metrology Engineer
requirement: Scope of Position: •	Provide metrology engineering and precision measurement services for plastic part first article inspection, primarily using Computed Tomography technology, in support of strategic alignment between metrology operations and plastic mold development projects. •	Advocate for and support the utilization of Computed Tomography, and other metrology technologies, in new product and process development projects.  Day to Day Responsibilities: •	Work directly with internal customers to establish metrological and project timing requirements and expectations.  •	Manage all aspects of the measurement uncertainty program for measurements and data provided to internal customers. •	Setup and execute measurements and scans, perform post-processing of 3D voxel data, and deliver reports and analysis to internal customers. •	With a focus on continues improvement and through the use of operational efficiency metrics, manage the operations of the CT machine and other equipment. •	As the local x-ray safety officer, serve as an advocate for safe operation of the CT machine while ensuring all regulatory requirements are met.  •	Manage all preventative maintenance and interim performance verification activities for the CT machine and other metrology equipment.
requirement_others: Preferred Skills: •	Knowledge of Zeiss Calypso and Neoinsight software or other coordinate metrology software packages with a focus on the application of GD&T for 3D part inspections using CT voxel data. •	Basic knowledge of plastic part mold making methodologies for effective integration with the Mold Development team’s strategy for rapid mold introduction and iteration.  •	Working knowledge of Computed Tomography systems, precision dimensional, coordinate, and surface metrology equipment and their metrological performance characteristics. •	Knowledge of metrology fundamentals: metrological traceability, measurement uncertainty, calibration, metrological environmental effects, measurand definition, etc. •	Awareness of national and international standards relating to dimensional metrology and measurement uncertainty (e.g ISO GPS and ASME B89). •	Desire to exceed internal customer expectations for quality and delivery. •	Ambition and ability to independently fill gaps in knowledge and expertise through self-guided learning. •	Knowledge of geometrical dimensioning and tolerancing per ASME Y14.5-2009. •	Experience in computer-aided design using Pro-E, SolidWorks, etc. •	Knowledge of statistical analysis of data: standard deviation, mean, statistical agreement tests, data transformation, trend identification, regression analysis, curve fitting, etc.  Soft Skills: •	English writing and speaking fluency as well awareness of global cultural behaviors  •	Ability to work closely with internal customers around the world to meet their requirements. •	Strong verbal and written communication skills. •	Self-motivated with ambition for technical growth. •	Accountable for actions/behaviors. •	Ability to work independently.  Travel Requirements: •	Up to 10%, global travel.   •	Must have the ability to obtain a passport with no restrictions preventing entry to the United States, China, Taiwan, Mexico, European Union Nations, or Brazil.  Hours of work/work schedule/flex-time: •	40+ hours/week  Preferred Education and Experience •	Bachelors or Masters of Science degree in Mechanical or Optical Engineering with an emphasis in, through education or research, precision engineering and metrology. •	3+ years experience in industrial or research-based metrology is preferred but directly applicable advanced education and/or research may be substituted for work experience.

company: 聯瞻資訊股份有限公司
title: 軟體開發工程師/網頁開發工程師
requirement: 聯瞻上班時間為AM10:00-PM19:00，我們提供友善的工作環境，非責任制；就算真的為了趕專案需要加班(頻率很低)，也請一定要申請加班費或補休！一切皆符合勞基法規定！  以下說明為此職缺的工作內容，但如果您技術經驗尚未成熟但對新技術充滿熱忱，期待全方位的成長；而不是單純坐在辦公室Coding及跟PM吵架，做小螺絲釘的工作；歡迎您跟我們聯絡。  基本技術要求 1.	Linux 基本操作 2.	基本資料庫指令概念 3.	基本程式能力(C/C++, Java, Python, PHP, Javascript, Node.js, Spark任一皆可) 4.     樂於團隊合作及共同分享技術新知。  5.     喜歡嘗試新技術，並能思考如何應用在現行專案中。   工作內容 主要使用工具：ELK(Node.js), Nagios(PHP and Mysql), Hadoop(Spark), Linux(Shell Script) -	建置Nagios, ELK及大數據分析專案。 -	可協助整合性專案作業進行。 -	可協助客製化產品開發。  * 犯錯沒關係，成長才是最重要的(不過事不過三哦~)。  * 我們是個年輕的團隊(絕對不是一言堂!)，期望在互相討論及自由的管理方式下，建立每個員工與公司最佳的合作模式，互相成長。  * 聯瞻有堅強專業技術及行銷團隊作為後盾，提供創新獨特全方位資訊顧問服務；基於目前的產品，我們也期望激發出更多創意，運用公司資源建立出更多符合客戶需求的產品。  * 我們深知沒有技術背景的PM會為RD造成多大的困擾，因此本公司提供全方位的訓練；我們重視技術人才的培養與未來發展，讓工程師不僅能增進專業技術能力，從生動的簡報製作到、客戶訪談及專案管控的過程中，都有辦法獨當一面。

company: LINE Taiwan_台灣連線股份有限公司
title: (LTEG) LINE Application Security Engineer
requirement: Application security is a very important part in LINE’s service development. Application security engineers are in charge of the security design of LINE services. They are involved in service architecture design, security module development, and application security review. Application security engineers must be able to perform application security review based on both whitebox and blackbox security testing.   They are also in charge of compiling secure development guidelines for R&D departments, in order to ensure our services are secure and reliable. System security architecture, secure code review, and penetration testing skills are mandatory for this position.  In addition, the application security team is responsible for research, development, and deployment of new security technologies, such as machine learning, biometric authentication, blockchain technologies, IoT security, and encryption module design. Security engineers can do research related to their respective projects or choose to work with the global security team on universally applicable technologies.  [Responsibility]  1. Perform risk assessment for family services -  Perform blackbox and whitebox security assessment for family services. -  Review technical design and provide suggestions to improve the system     security. -  Co-work with global teams to deal with the application security issues.  2. Anti-Abusing -  Analyze account abusing with global anti-abusing team. -  Deal with service abusing cases. -  Help to improve the anti-abusing system.  3. Candidate have to perform at least one of the major jobs mentioned above.  [Qualifications] 1. Required Skills and Qualifications -  Must be familiar with both attack and protection best practices of    OWASP TOP 10. - Must be familiar with Web service security and authentication protocols,    such as, OAuth 2.0, WebAuth SAML, and TLS. - Must be familiar with contemporary encryption technologies, protocols,    and algorithms. - Should be able to write and review Java and Python applications. - Fluent English.  2. Preferred Skills and Qualifications -  Familiar with machine learning or data science. -  Familiar data analysis tools, such as ELK and Hadoop. -  Familiar with modern vulnerability scan tools, such AppScan, WebInspect, BurpSuite and etc. -  Familiar about code review tools, such as Fortify and CheckMarx. -  Japanese or Korean language skill.

company: Qualcomm Taiwan Corporation_台灣高通股份有限公司
title: Intern – Product Test Engineering (Jan., 2019 onboard)
requirement: Qualcomm Technologies, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Qualcomm Incorporated is the world largest fabless semiconductor manufacturer of Digital, RF, RFFE, PMIC, and Analog products serving the Mobile (4G LTE, 5G), Connectivity, Compute, Automotive and the Internet of Things (IOT) markets. Product and Test Engineering (PTE) is offering exciting internship opportunities which apply DFT strategies, design principles, and test concepts into real world semiconductor applications. Interns will be trained by experts and will perform DOEs and data analysis on large volume production data with the goal of correlating findings back to pre-silicon simulations. The position offers and exciting and nurturing environment for college students to explore a career in the field of semi-conductors.  We are looking for enthusiastic candidates that have strong analytical/problem solving skills, be fluent in English (written and verbal), and have good organizational skills. Qualcomm is committed to creating an innovative environment, engineering excellence, and investing in your career growth. We look forward to talking to you about how you become part of our team.
requirement_others: - Able to commit at least 3 months internship and work 20 hours per week. - Prefer students in final year, eligible to work as full-time employee starting summer 2019. - Pursing Master of Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering. - Applicable course work: Digital Logic, Computer Architecture, VLSI design, Semi-Conductor Physics, Statistics, Programming Language (C++, JAVA, Python, VB) , Digital Communications, Wireless Communications - Advanced course work: DFT and Fault Modeling, Machine Learning Algorithms, RF Measurement Methods

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

company: 新漢股份有限公司
title: (CE0-B001 ) 資訊系統(高級)工程師
requirement: NEXCOM基於即將到來之產業4.0時代，積極尋求具『系統觀』之雲端/物聯網/大數據/行動與自動化之開發、整合與管理之優秀人才，以實現網宇虛實整合系統(CPS)之目標，並儲備未來資通訊方面之幹部。  本職務主要工作範圍為 I4.0資訊服務系統之開發與整合，包含但不限於：企業系統整合(EAI)、商業智慧(BI)、戰情室監控系統(War Room)、…等。 本部門亦進行雲霧端運算 (Cloud/Fog/Edge Computing) 應用與基礎建設之整合管理，如虛擬化技術 (Virtualization) ，軟體容器 (Software Container Technology) …等。以及 IT (Information Technology) 與 OT (Operation Technology) 之開發與整合，如Sensor Network (含有線與無線)、Indoor Positioning System(室內定位系統)、SCADA (數據採集與監控) …等。
requirement_others: 熟悉下列至少一種以上語言或工具: C/C++, Java, Python, Web-based programming [Javascript, PHP, HTML5…], Shell scripts。  以及下列至少一種以上相關經驗 1. 具備Database操作與開發經驗或能力(Structured and/or unstructured)。 2. 具備Web Application開發經驗或能力，具Data Visualization 經驗者尤佳。 3. 具備Network/communication protocol programming (Socket, RPC, RESTful/SOAP/MQTT/AMQP/XMPP/CoAP…etc.) 開發經驗或能力，具Message Queue programming 經驗者尤佳。 4. 具備無線網路定位系統開發經驗或能力。 5. 具備高效能運算系統 (High Performance Computing)或Machine Learning開發經驗或能力。 6. 具備Cloud/Fog/Edge Computing相關技術開發經驗或能力。

company: 雲動科技股份有限公司
title: Computer Vision Engineer
requirement: Orbweb is dedicated to advancing state-of-the-art computer vision and deep learning technologies. As part of this focus, we are building a team of exceptional researchers and engineers to infuse intelligence in our devices and services to touch the lives of millions of users every day. We are looking for people with backgrounds in computer vision and deep learning.   This hands-on position requires broad engineering competence and in-depth technical knowledge of service engineering, as well as demonstrated experience successfully planning, organizing, and conducting software development projects in a dynamic environment. The Software Engineer will -   Develop and deploy cloud software framework for computer vision processing Design and develop innovative REST APIs and SDKs to deliver computer vision and machine learning capabilities Integrate computer vision capabilities with Orbweb’s Cloud services Provide technical leadership and contribute to the definition, development, integration, test, and documentation Be responsible for the architecture of software solutions, determining current limitations and compatibility between subsystems, the selection of new concepts and methodology, and the development of major routines and utilities. Create new feature and performance improvements Prepare technical requirements and software design specifications. Instill best practices for software development and documentation, making sure designs meet requirements, and delivering high quality software on tight schedules.   Key Qualifications  Solid foundation in computer vision and deep learning. Domain knowledge of Computer Vision and/or Deep Learning  Passion for working on cutting edge technologies and product delivery  Solid C/C++ and system building skills  Excellent understanding of data structures and algorithms  Self motivated  Excellent problem solving skills  Excellent communication skills   Preferred Qualifications - PhD or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field  - Experience with OpenCV. - Experience in GPU programming and performance tuning, ideally using OpenCL  - Experience in CPU performance analysis and optimization - Experience/knowledge in Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition (e.g. neural network) - Strong communication and team collaboration skills   Description  Computer Vision and Perception  Solve the most challenging problems in computer vision and perception. Be part of a multidisciplinary team designing algorithms to analyze and fuse complex sensor data streams. We work on everything from low-level image processing algorithms to deep neural network approaches for object detection, always mindful of the balance between algorithm correctness and computational performance.   Deep Learning  We are looking for exceptional hands-on research scientists with a proven track record in a variety of machine learning methods: Supervised and unsupervised learning, generative models, temporal learning, multi-modal input streams, and other modern approaches. You will be joining a world-class, multidisciplinary team and will be participating in cutting- edge research in deep learning and artificial intelligence. You will be solving real-world, large-scale problems.

company: Qualcomm Taiwan Corporation_台灣高通股份有限公司
title: Video Coding Expert (Req#E1969762)
requirement: Join Qualcomm Technologies, Inc., and contribute to the corporate and industry-wide initiatives for developing advanced video codec.  The successful candidates will be part of the video R&D team developing next generation video coding technologies. Offered positions range from engineer to senior staff level.   - Contribute to the conception, development, implementation and optimization of new algorithms allowing to further improve coding efficiency over state-of-the-art video codecs such as VVC. Considerable focus will be placed on compression of High Dynamic Range and Wide Color Gamut content as well as Virtual Reality and 6DoF video. - Consider application of the latest advancements in Machine Learning to video compression.  - Champion the results of your work in the related standardization forums: JVET, MPEG Video and ITU-T/VCEG. - Contribute to the implementation of HEVC and future video codecs such as VVC on mobile devices. Design encoder architecture, functional models and data structure for efficient hardware and software implementation. - Develop encoder algorithms such as mode decision, motion estimation and rate control. Initiate ideas, design and implement algorithms for superior encoder performance, including perceptually based bit allocation with reasonable complexity and implementation cost. - Participate in video codec prototyping on Qualcomm devices. Work closely with other cross-functional teams.  All Qualcomm employees are expected to actively support diversity on their teams, and in the Company.    + years industry or academic experience required in one or more of the following areas: - Digital signal processing and information theory, familiarity with latest machine learning technology a bonus. - Record of innovation: granted patents in the area of video or image coding, processing, , publications.   Preferred Qualifications   - PhD degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science preferred. - Knowledge of multimedia compression and the relevant formats such as H.265/HEVC, H.264/MPEG-4 AVC. - Proficiency in C++ and/or C programming, experience with SIMD and code optimization preferred. - Experience modelling for ASIC design and verification.

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

title: Staff Research Engineer
requirement: The Staff Research Engineer will be an active researcher with an established international reputation, who makes technical contributions to projects that deliver value for Xilinx. These contributions will span hardware, software, and applications, using a variety of languages, methodologies, and tools.  The current technical focus for the group include data centers/edge computing (both communication aspects like software-defined networking, and computation aspects like big data and blockchain).   It is expected that the research engineer will have a background and practical skills that enable significant contributions within these areas.  However, it is essential that the research engineer has a flexible approach to research topics, since Xilinx Labs adopts a very agile approach to address rapidly changing opportunities and priorities.  The research engineer will participate in the building of a collaborative ecosystem in Singapore and around the Asia-Pacific region, including startups, research institutes, and university groups.    The research engineer will participate in relevant industry forums and research conferences.

title: Camera Systems Engineer, Pixel - New Taipei City
requirement: Minimum qualifications: MS degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering or equivalent practical experience. 5 years of experience in camera ISP, image processing or computer vision. Experience with C++, Python, Matlab. Experience in low-level C/C++ design suitable for hardware implementations.  Preferred qualifications: Experience with machine learning applied to imaging  Understanding of the imaging pipeline. Understanding of computational photography algorithms and limitations. Signal processing experience and understanding of color spaces and image quality metrics.  About the job Our computational challenges are so big, complex and unique we can't just purchase off-the-shelf hardware, we've got to make it ourselves. Your team designs and builds the hardware, software and networking technologies that power all of Google's services. As a Hardware Engineer, you design and build the systems that are the heart of the world's largest and most powerful computing infrastructure. You develop from the lowest levels of circuit design to large system design and see those systems all the way through to high volume manufacturing. Your work has the potential to shape the machinery that goes into our cutting-edge data centers affecting millions of Google users. Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Devices & Services team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences for users. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, the Devices & Services team is making people's lives better through technology.  Responsibilities Work with the camera hardware team to co-develop analysis algorithms. Work with firmware imaging pipeline to improve output of ISP. Work with Android Camera team, develop cutting-edge image processing algorithms in C++.

company: Qualcomm Taiwan Corporation_台灣高通股份有限公司
title: Software Design Engineer - BSP for Machine Learning Sr. Engineer (E1973014)
requirement: Qualcomm CR&D is looking for an experienced BSP software developer to support ODM board manufacture. Individual would work closely with teams located in the San Diego, CA/Boulder, CO and would include authoring board & SOC level self-diagnostic tests. An ideal candidate should be familiar with: board support packages and device driver development (bare-metal, RTOS & HLOS environments), secure boot, Cortex-A v8 trust-zone, low-speed peripheral interfaces, chipset power, clock tree management and PCIe. Job Description You will join the CR&D software team working on supporting ODMs located in the Taiwan area with an initial focus on authoring self-diagnostic capability that will be integrated into the main production firmware. The individual should ideally have experience with high volume production as well as low level software and board level debug skills. You will be collaborating with a variety of teams within Qualcomms as well as working directly with the ODMs covering multiple engineering disciplines including: software, systems and hardware. As a successful applicant to CR&D, the ideal candidate should have a diverse skill set including a strong background in embedded software development. Familiarity with debugging Linux based peripherals at the device driver level would be a plus. Required Skills and Aptitudes Experience in C/C++ development (debug and testing, preferable using GNU/LLVM tools) on embedded platforms using stop-mode debug tools such as JTAG/SWD Experience working with BSP development including device driver development, board-bring-up, RTOSs, secure boot & trust zone C/C++ developing Firmware peripheral drivers. Knowledge of RTOS, SoC architecture (core, cache, memory, bus architecture, IOs, etc.) and common hardware blocks Experience with Source Code and Configuration management tools, git knowledge is required Software debugging skills on embedded real time operating systems Willingness to work in a structured software development environment with ability to work on low level implementation (code & test) Willingness to work in a high-caliber mixed hardware/software development team Good English communication (written and verbal) and positive interpersonal skills.
requirement_others: Minimum Qualifications		 -Worked with PCIe, DDR controllers, multi-channel DMA engines and NOCs -5+ years of relevant experience -Scripting languages such as Python -Familiar working with software running on bare-metal and RTOS based targets using ARM Cortex-A CPUs and/or DSPs -Experience working with and familiarity with important SOC building blocks like interrupt controller, timers is a strong plus -Software development and debug tools including compilers, profilers, source control systems, emulators, JTAG and serial debuggers, and logic analyzers -Familiar with device driver and module development -Familiarity with Cortex-A CPUs trust-zone model -Experience working with boot code for ARM processors, including secure boot  Preferred Qualifications		 NA  Education Requirements		 Required: Bachelor's, Electrical Engineering or equivalent experience Preferred: Master's, Electrical Engineering or equivalent experience

We currently have just over 190+ employees here at our Birmingham HQ and we offer some of the UK’s best career progression plans and earning potential with bi-annual salary reviews! [About You] -MS/PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Math, Physics, related technical fields or equivalent practical experiences. -Strong collaboration/communication skills with multi-disciplinary teams, including business and engineering. -Expertise in exploratory data analysis and machine learning and/or statistical inference, with fair understanding details under the hood and good balance between methodology and practice. -Coding, coding, coding in Python or R. -Efficient in SQL-like data query. -Linux, Git/GitLab and cloud computing experience, such as AWS, GCP, is a plus. -Hadoop ecosystem experience, such as Spark, Hive, is a plus. -Hands-on designing/implementing end-to-end data ETL pipeline experience is a plus. -Building insights dashboards experience using, for example Tableau is a plus. -Extra points on keeping up with the state-of-the-art machine learning and data analytics technologies, and learning how to learn. -Advertising/marketing industry experience is a plus. -Publication experience is a plus. -Fluent English is must.  [Pay range...] Monthly Salary= NTD$60,000-NTD$120,000 Annual Package=  + monthly salary X 12 months  + year-end guarantee bonus (2 months salary/per full year)  + year-end performance bonus (0.5-3 months based on performance evaluation) + first year 16 days annual leave+ 5 days sick leave with pay. (on pro rata basis)

company: 美商網基股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: Sr. NLP Engineer
requirement: 關於美商網基 -  總部位於矽谷，美商網基是一家快速成長且充滿創業精神的公司。在全球社群媒體分析平台上, 我們處於世界領先地位, 每年達到30%以上的成長!   我們將網際網路上的資訊，如 Facebook 貼文、Instagram圖片、 YouTube留言、Twitter 等資訊，經由最尖端的自然語言處理技術(Natural Language Processing)及電腦視覺(Computer Vision)分析之後，轉化為能幫助客戶更快，更精準的做出商業決策的工具平台。   NetBase is looking for a Sr. NLP Engineer to join the Natural Language Processing/Computer Vision engineering group as part of the Artificial Intelligence Research & Development team.  The mission of the AI R&D team is to drive innovation in Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, and Data Science to surface insights from massive amounts of social media and survey data. We are delivering on the promise of AI-assisted analytics, earning a position as a leader in our space in a 2018 Forrester Wave report (https://pages.netbase.com/AR-2018-ForresterWave.html). Our customers recognize the value of our AI as well – watch this video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6HmmZPDSGU) to see leaders from iMAX, Visa, Chili’s, and GoDaddy rave about our work! We are currently building on that success with major new AI initiatives that will keep us on the cutting edge.  You will be part of diverse but cohesive group with complimentary skills that values continuous growth and learning. We support conference attendance and ongoing education, believing that our success depends on the career development of our team members. Team members are encouraged to spend 20% of their time on technical projects of their choice. We also provide an enjoyable working environment, with funded regular group activities, a budget for personal technical gear, and no need to work on compensating Saturdays.  On the NetBase AI R&D team you will build on a strong NLP architecture, with projects such as: •	Knowledge Graph development to support use cases such as concept-based analysis and disambiguation •	Research and implementation of cutting edge techniques for information extraction •	Development of NLP modules that can be offered as microservices to the rest of the data processing pipeline •	Architecture changes to support configurable models and analysis at the individual user level  RESPONSIBILITIES •	Contribute to code base for NLP pipeline including APIs, services, and libraries •	Collaborate with team members to develop creative solutions for product features relying on NLP  •	Identify innovative solutions to improve on NLP components and analysis  •	Focus on code scalability and efficiency to process large volumes of text data effectively •	Stay informed of new developments in NLP technologies and software packages and adopt them for our code base as appropriate •	Follow Agile development methodology  REQUIREMENTS •	5+ years software industry experience with a BS degree in Computer Science or related field (MS or PhD a plus) •	Experience contributing to NLP projects through full development and deployment cycle •	Experience in applying machine learning techniques to NLP •	Strong Java skills (C++ experience is a plus) •	Strong written and verbal English skills

company: 群瑜股份有限公司
title: 硬體研發工程師（Hardware Developer）
requirement: 本職務工作內容為車用電子產品：高頻電路設計、控制電路設計、通訊系統電路設計以及影像系統設計。根據系統功能使用RISC Base ARM為系統晶片與8 / 16 BIT MCU為主。根據產品特性歸納為以下：* 控制負責開發車身電子控制單元：車身車體控制及微機電系統整合（Body Electronics）主要工作內容：以8 / 16 BIT MCU韌體開發為主控制馬達電機、Sensor（包括Camera）類型的產品。分為被動安全：包括POWER SEAT CONTRO UNIT（座椅控制單元）、SUNROOF CONTROL UNIT（天窗控制單元）、WINDOW CONTROL UNIT（邊窗控制單元）、DOOR CONTROL UNIT（車門控制單元）、KEY CONTROL UNIT WITH RKE（SMART KEY）、WIPER CONTROL UNIT（雨刷控制單元）、DASHBOARD（車用儀表系統）與主動安全：動力電源管理系統（POWERTRAIN MANAGEMENT SYSTEM）、防盜系統（ANTI-THEFT SYSTEM）或輔助安全如：LANE DEPARTURE WARNING SYSTEM（道路偏移警示系統）等現代汽車主要常見的Applications。* 通訊：負責開發車內提供多個系統溝通的通訊設備、裝置與界面：V2V ROUTER（VEHICLE TO VEHICLE FOR INTER-VEHICLE COMMUNICATION）使用DEDICATED SHORT-RANGE COMMUNICATION METHOD為主如WI-FI AP、AUTOMOTIVE GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER（FOR CONNECTED CAR）（車用網路路由器）、GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT（閘道控制器）主要目的為減少車內的Wiring Neting。經研究調查一台現代汽車約有1.5KM至2.0KM左右的線束。線束多使用鎳、銅等材料。在缺乏通訊架構的基礎下成車組裝在各個生產階段不僅生產工時不合理。組裝作業繁瑣。以系統成面檢視除錯級MAINTAIN也須付出非常不經濟的代價。在汽車工業的領域90年代雖產生控制器區域網路的架構（CAN / LIN / MOST / FLEXRAY）。幾個主要的PROTOCOL也定義出來。但在產品面依然無法實踐PLUG-IN-USE。俱有自診斷功能的車型也多屬高價位車種。顯示採用率與普及率非常低落。為面對新一波的市場需求與產業趨勢。車內須俱有能夠快速實踐SELF-DIAGNOSTIC的中介裝置與使用方便的標準界面。同時滿足機器學習（MACHINE LEARNING）與聯網（CONNECTIVITY）等兩個技術領域在技術開發的需求。目前包括硬體在內將技術研發目標總結為以下產品：1. ECU（ELECTRIC CONTROL UNIT）    包括主動安全、被動安全、輔助安全2. GCU（GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT）    系統內通訊3. POWER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM    電源監控、調節與管理4. GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER    連網5. IVI In-Vehicle Infotainment以上職務需要俱備有良好的工作能力以及開發產品的熱情。歡迎在各領域有不同產品開發經驗的Developer加入。相關領域研究生無經驗亦可。
requirement_others: 上開所列技能未要求投遞履歷者需要樣樣精通。無相關工作經歷或跨領域投遞履歷者請確保基本技能及先行評估學習能力。

title: Machine Learning/Deep learning 工程師
requirement: 工作內容： 1. 人臉識別領域算法開發(Face detection, Face Recognition, Face Alignment, Object Tracking, Face Quality) 2. 影像處理領域算法開發 3. 為移動式平台開發速度與效能兼具的 Neural Network Architecture 4. 對應不同需求做 ML model converter(Tensorflow <==> Caffe, Tensorflow <==> MxNet, PyTorch <==> Caffe2) 5. 將ML算法移植為純 C++ 或 Java 端產品可使用之模型, 並進行應用端整合 6. 針對 Qualcomm 晶片平台做 ML 硬體加速(GPU, DSP) 7. 針對 Android 平台架構做 ML 優化處理
requirement_others: Must have: 1. 熟悉 C++ 或 Java， 熟悉Python，熟悉OpenCV 2. 熟悉 Linux 平台操作 3. 熟悉一種或以上的機器學習套件， Tensorflow/Keras/Caffe/Theano/MxNet/CNTK/PyTorch 4. 熟悉影像處理和人工智能的演算法，並且有實際作品 5. 對於 Machine learning training pipeline 有深刻了解  6. 兩年以上的機器視覺/影像處理開發經驗或是主修機器視覺 7. 良好的團隊合作與溝通能力  Nice to have: 1. 曾經使用過下列 Neural Network Architecture:     SqueezeNet, MobileNet, ShuffleNet, Xception, SSD, Yolo, Mask R-CNN 2. 曾經使用過下列 Loss function:     Focal loss, Triplet loss, Center loss, Additive Cosine Margin loss, Additive Angular Margin Loss 3. 曾經使用過 Tensorflow Datasets API, Estimator API 4. 曾經使用過 Tensorflow Serving 5. 曾經使用過 Snapdragon Neural Processing Engine 6. 曾經使用過 AWS/Azure/GCP 任一雲端平台 7. 熟悉於清洗, 處理巨量圖像資料 8. 在機器視覺或是人工智能相關的Top conference 發表過論文或是有Kaggle競賽名次者
address: 台北市南港區忠孝東路六段４６７號９Ｆ
benefit: 員工是奇卓科技最重要的資產，更是創造市場競爭力的關鍵。因此本公司十分重視員工的福祉，我們提供完善的福利措施與關懷照顧，建構健全且適才適所的優質工作環境。   ★完善的保險:  (1) 勞、健、團保及退休金提撥 (2) 團保: 壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險  (3) 眷屬皆可加保公司團險  (4) 員工出差旅平險   ★休假給假制度：  (1) 新進同仁提前給予特休 (2) 給薪婚假、喪假、產檢假、陪產假、產假...等   ★關懷生活:  (1) 彈性工時-7.5小時        - 我們重視工作效率, 尊重自主管理       -  例如: 早上10點到晚上7點, 中午休息1.5小時 (2) 新人交誼餐敘  ★三節獎金 ★舒適的環境設施

company: 華新麗華股份有限公司
title: 【108年研發替代役】資料科學家
requirement: 華新麗華再造工業典範（創新轉型之路）　誠摯邀請您的加入華新麗華成立於1966年，今年邁入第53年，回首過往的五十年，在見證世界從製造經濟走向知識經濟的同時，華新麗華亦竭盡所能的轉型精進，努力將專業與資源充分運用，創造多元且可持續的發展，期盼能成為經得起時代淬鍊、真正卓越的企業，為社會帶來關鍵、有意義的影響，而這樣的信念與使命華新麗華都必須持守、力行與傳承。 自90年代起，華新麗華積極在台灣與大陸設廠，以穩健、誠信之企業理念，逐步在兩岸線纜與不銹鋼領域中嶄露頭角；近年來，工業4.0浪潮來襲，是企業提升能力的時代機遇，藉由智能化的推進，我們期望能夠提供具有“匠人”精神的人才一個能夠發揮發光的環境，達成華新麗華在科技應用、精密工程、精實管理、市場導向以及以人為本的企業目標，這其中“匠人”精神更是帶動企業轉型與突破的關鍵。 　　匠人，指的是熱愛自己的工作，更不逃避瑕疵與失敗，一心只想著如何改善與追求極致，“用心做事”是他們的人生哲學，並希望將畢生所學傳承下去，這樣的態度稱之為「匠人精神」。我們相信，在各領域中皆有匠人，因此，我們努力尋找在各領域中的匠人，隨著策略工作的推動，發揮所長。1.進行資料清整, 並對企業需求提供資料分析, 建模與視覺化服務2.其他主管交辦事項工作
requirement_others: 1.具備關聯性資料庫、資料倉儲或 BI 系統 (ex：Tableau) 基礎知識。2.擅長統計及數學模型架構相關技能，或data mining/machine learning相關演算法。3.熟悉資料分析語言 (ex：R、Python)。4. 具備資料清整與處理不完整資料的經驗尤佳。

requirement_others: [工作技能] 1.SQL、NoSQL 等資料庫 2.Text/Data Mining、工業工程等資料處理/分析相關技術專業知識，分析問題定義與解決能力，過去相關學術論文發表 3.Hadoop、Spark、R、Storm等大數據處理分析軟體 4.能獨立作業，抗壓性高。  舒適的工作環境，靠近善導市站六號出口，交通方便。 公司定位於國際市場，目前與印尼，菲律賓等東拿亞區域，大陸與美國等皆有專案進行合作。  公司配一台 macbook 或 其他nb。 熱情、細心、積極、思考邏輯清晰、善於溝通協調佳，最重要是你認同我們的理念，可以和我們一起成長！  歡迎你加入我們的團隊。 如果我們覺得你適合這份工作，我們會跟你約個時間面試（如果你不在台北，也可以先電話面試）。  如果我們覺得您不太適合這個職務，也一定會回信告訴您為什麼，後續若有相關適合職缺進展也會優先聯繫您。  如果願意的話，順便在信件裡回答以下問題，我們會與您回信交流我們想法： 為什麼想應徵這個工作？ 在「必要條件」和「加分項目」中你不符合的項目有哪些？ 平常都去哪裡看技術文章？ 你覺得未來幾年內最值得投資的技術是什麼？
