title: 35912_MT&E Asia_Data Analytics Engineer
requirement: Purpose of the Position: As a leading manufacturing and technology company, Corning manufacturing systems generate a vast amount of process and product data through advanced control and measurement systems. The data analytic engineer position will be responsible for transforming these valuable data assets into deep insights into the manufacturing process, and help different Corning businesses to improve their manufacturing processes or design new ones for our long-term success. In parallel, the data analytics engineer will work with a global multifunctional team to advance Corning’s Smart Manufacturing strategy with the state-of-art technologies (such as advanced analytics, machine learnings, etc.).  Day to Day Responsibilities: 	Select, evaluate and implement appropriate analytics tools and options (ie. statistics methods or machine learning techniques) to perform exploratory and targeted data analysis and apply the findings to process measurement and control solutions. 	Act as an expert in data analytics field to develop and customize algorithms as necessary to meet Corning’s business requirements on existing or new processes. 	Evaluate and demonstrate quantifiable impact on the raw materials, finished product, manufacturing process and manufacturing supporting systems through the use of data analytics and data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Power BI … etc). 	Write technical reports summarizing development, application, and validation of the technical analysis. 	Share and contribute Corning’s data analytics community of practice in developing the capabilities and promoting areas of applications. 	Support senior data analytics engineer in delivery of basic and advanced data analysis courses in the organization and provide technical consultancy to wide spectrum of user groups within company.
requirement_others: Education & Experience   	Minimum MS Degree (PhD preferred) in applied mathematics, statistics, computer science or a comparable field of study with specialization in data analytics & machine learning. 	1-3 year of work experience in similar field, analytical algorithms development or modeling experience. Required Skills                                                 	Be well acquainted in dealing with mathematical & statistical algorithms (e.g. regression, Bayesian models and numerical optimization etc.) and machine learning techniques (e.g. clustering, classification and neural networks etc.) 	Data Analysis knowledge using any mix of software including, but not limited to: JMP, MATLAB, R, Minitab, SAS. 	Working knowledge of programming in Python. 	Ability to analyze, optimize and debug scientific code. 	Able to work with complex databases. 	Experience compiling and running code on high-performance computers.  Desired Skills   	Knowledge of machine learning libraries (such as Tensor Flow, Keras, CNTK, Theano, SciKit-learn, Torch). 	Proficiency in Statistical Methods including DOE, Hypothesis Testing, Inferential Statistics, ANOVA, Multivariate Analysis, Linear and Non-linear models and Regression Analysis 	Basic understanding of Big Data technologies (such as Hadoop, Spark, etc) and Cloud solutions 	Strong mathematical and programming skills and capability for independently preparing data (ETL functions of cleaning, consolidating, transforming data) for machine learning purposes.  	Ability to bridge gaps between “domain” language (engineering, science) and “computing solution” language.  Soft Skills                                                 	Ability to support multiple projects concurrently. 	Maintain technical curiosity and willingness to learn with strong problem solving and analytical skills. 	Must be collaborative and able to openly engage multinational interdisciplinary team to achieve project goals. 	Ability to communicate effectively by phone and video with team members in international locations. 	Clear dedication to excellence and advancing beyond the current state. 	Self-motivated with an ability to manage one’s own work with minimum supervision.

company: Google_美商科高國際有限公司
title: Imaging and Vision Architect
requirement: Minimum qualifications: Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience. Experience in C or C++. Experience in digital imaging and computer vision methods and algorithms. Experience in imaging or vision pipeline.  Preferred qualifications: Doctorate's degree in Computer Science or Electric Engineering, or a related field. 5 years of relevant industry experience. Experience developing hardware IP. Experience in array cameras, computational photography techniques, depth sensing cameras and others. Deep understanding of machine learning or image/video processing algorithms for consumer photography or mobile applications. Understanding of image quality metrics.  About the job Our computational challenges are so big, complex and unique we can't just purchase off-the-shelf hardware, we've got to make it ourselves. Your team designs and builds the hardware, software and networking technologies that power all of Google's services. As an Imaging and Vision Architect, you design and build the systems that are the heart of the world's largest and most powerful computing infrastructure. You develop from the lowest levels of circuit design to large system design and see those systems all the way through to high volume manufacturing. Your work has the potential to shape the machinery that goes into our cutting-edge data centers affecting millions of Google users.  In this role, you will develop new algorithms and hardware architectures for hardware-accelerated image and video processing applications. You will work on topics that span areas of image processing, digital imaging, computer vision, computational photography, and machine intelligence. You will invent new algorithms, develop architectural C-models and specify architectures for future generation products. You will also collaborate with Software and Hardware Architects to explore, build and test the best hardware architectures to process images and videos for applications including digital photography and machine intelligence.  Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Hardware team researches, designs, and develops new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, more powerful, and seamless. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, our Hardware team is making people's lives better through technology.  Responsibilities Invent imaging pipeline blocks suitable for hardware implementations. Evaluate the architectural design and algorithms for digital photography, computer vision or machine intelligence scenarios. Design, define and specify computer vision and image and video processing IP. Author hardware specifications for efficient and practical implementation. Work with System on a Chip (SOC) Architecture team to understand and improve the architecture and use cases. Work with the Image Quality and Software teams to understand their requirements and to improve the designs.

company: TomTom Asia_通騰科技股份有限公司
title: GIS Data Engineer 6-month Intern (July - December 2019)
requirement: At TomTom… You’ll move the world forward. Every day, we create the most innovative mapping and location technologies to shape tomorrow’s mobility for the better. We are proud to be one team of more than 5,000 unique, curious, passionate problem-solvers spread across the world. We bring out the best in each other. And together, we help the automotive industry, businesses, developers, drivers, citizens and cities move towards a safe, autonomous world that is free of congestion and emissions.  What you’ll do   TomTom is currently looking for a GIS Data Engineering Intern to join our Sourcing Operations team in Taipei, Taiwan. The role is to work individually and as part of a team to accomplish special project(s) related to the scope of work within Sourcing Operations for Taiwan within your tenure. Approximately 25% of your time can be spent on independent projects.   What you’ll need  * Strong communication skills within a team environment and proficiency in Chinese and English languages; * Proactive mindset with strong willingness to learn and able to work independently; * Currently studying Computer Science, Software Engineering, GIS, Geography or related area with high interest in data analysis or machine learning; * Competence with programming language such as Java, Python, PHP and Javascript (a plus), AI tooling experience (a plus); * Experience in GIS (ArcGIS, QGIS) or SQL (PostgreSQL, SQLite) software; * Only apply if you are a Taiwan citizen or have a valid working permit in Taiwan.   Meet your team We’re Maps, a product unit within TomTom’s Location Technology Products technical unit. Our team is comprised of over 2,000 people in 40 countries – all driven to deliver the most up-to-date, accurate and detailed maps for the hundreds of millions of people using TomTom maps around the world. Joining our team, you’ll help continuously innovate our map-making processes, create a real-time closed loop between detected changes in the real world and the users’ map, and build maps that will enable the future of autonomous driving.  Achieve more  We are self-starters who play well with others. Every day, we solve new problems with creativity, meet new people and learn rapidly at our offices around the world. We will invest in your growth and are committed to supporting you. In everything we do, we’re guided by six values: We care, putting our heart into what we do; we build trust (you can count on us); we create – driven to make a difference; we are confident, but don’t boast; we keep it simple, since life is complex enough; and we have fun because life’s too short to be boring.   After you apply Our recruitment team will work hard to give you a meaningful experience throughout the process, no matter the outcome. Your application will be screened closely and you can rest assured that all follow-up actions will be thorough, from assessments and interviews through your onboarding.  TomTom is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity, thrive on each other’s differences and are committed to creating an inclusive environment at our offices around the world. Naturally, we do not discriminate against any employee or job applicant because of race, religion, color, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, marital status, disability, national origin, genetics, or age.  Ready to move the world forward?

title: 資料軟體工程師(高雄/桃園)
requirement: 我們是一個專注在提供資料分析平台、解決方案與顧問服務的團隊，團隊成員組成主要包含統計、資料探勘、機器學習、資料庫等背景。我們徵求有高度企圖心的資料工程師來共同打造世界一流之產品，發揮資料科學的商業影響力。The Data Software Engineer will be responsible for developing data engineering functions/data structure designs, optimizing various source codes for end-to-end analytical workflows, building efficient and scalable systems, platforms, and commercialized products. We are looking forward to working with Data Software Engineers with strong passion for transforming big data to big value.• Data Engineering  o Understand customers’ requirements and develop flowcharts, layouts and documentations to access and identify solutions.  o Implement efficient data engineering functions (including data ingestion, cleaning, ETL, integration, etc.).  o Write high performance and comprehensive SQL to process data in relational databases (or Map/Reduce style querying for NoSQL databases).  o Work closely with data science team to design and develop scalable data pipeline or end-to-end analytical workflow.• Software Engineering  o Produce specifications and determine operational feasibility.  o Write well-designed and testable code for building an efficient and stable data system to support data analytical functions and back-end system developments.  o Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems.  o Provide on-going maintenance, support and enhancements in existing systems and platforms.• Collaborate effectively with team members, whether leading projects or supporting initiatives led by others• Collaborate cross-functionally with data scientists, business users, project managers and other engineers to achieve elegant solutions• Provide direction, training, and guidance to less experienced team members
requirement_others: • Proficient in R/Python and related data processing packages (e.g., Pandas)• Proven experience in developing data pipeline, data processing workflow, or data analytics system• Master in using SQL to process data in relational databases such as Oracle and PostgreSQL as well as NoSQL databases.• Ability to thrive in a dynamic, collaborative team environment• Ability to document requirements and specifications• Excellent verbal and written communication skills• (Preferred) Have experience in data mining and machine learning• (Plus) Familiar with Linux operation system• (Plus) Have experience working with Hadoop ecosystem (e.g., Map Reduce, Hive, Oozie) or Spark, Kafka, Flume, etc• (Plus) Have experience in system/database performance tuning

requirement: This position, either Jr. or Sr. professional, is a combined role of customer service and key account relationship. Not required to travel, she or he is an integral part of Client Success Department, who are incentivized by retaining paid members’ satisfaction and identifying further opportunities.  When a prospect is identified, she or he will assist Client Success Executives/ Manager with membership registration, demos and trials. As soon as the prospect subscribes, this professional will begin to get involved in account set-up, training, technical support and troubleshooting.   In addition, she or he owns a number of key accounts to manage. Timely and comprehensively addressing their inquiries, concerns and even complaints, the professional uses phones, emails, Zoom and/ or any other online/ offline means at work or home to communicate and to maintain satisfactory relationships with the major clients. When identifying unmet needs, she or he can work with Client Success Manager to cross-sell or up-sell by offering a product fit to the clients.   She or he will also act as an assisting partner to the Manager with work responsibilities ranging from translating customer inquiries and their corresponding replies into FAQ’s in English or Chinese, to updating Help Center and Service Alerts in circulation, to performing online chat, to doing some other administrative work related to sales and ad-hoc assignments by the Manager.   Cross-functionally, this talent will work with Marketing on digital communications, market surveys and on-boarding, with Finance on ERP and PO management, and with PM on trial and subscription account set-up.

company: 台達電子工業股份有限公司 _DELTA ELECTRONICS INC.
title: Software Engineer(Streaming)_台達研究院(台北)
requirement: Established in 2013, Delta Research Center (DRC) is devoted to big data analytics as well as the development and integration of applications and solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT) to enable the acceleration of enterprise transformation and upgrade. Meanwhile, DRC takes an open collaboration approach to actively collaborate with partners from industrial sectors, government agencies, academia, and research institutions for the mutual success of ecosystem.   As a software engineer specializing in media streaming, you will play a key role in the design and development of our Cyber-Physical System for Smart Learning. The qualified candidate will contribute to build the next-generation solution of Education for Enterprise that elevates learning effectiveness through the use of hardware-software integration, multimedia, human-computer interaction, immersive technologies, and learning analytics. We are looking for self-motivated, detail-oriented and skillful talent to join our team and make things happen.  Our development primarily uses Java, JavaScript and relevant open-source libraries. Experiences with these tools are highly preferred, but above all, we value your desire to learn, understand new things and to work with others as part of a team.   Responsibilities: -	Collaborate with project stakeholders to identify requirements and translate them into technical media frameworks and functionalities. -	Define the structure of multimedia streaming system and map alternative approaches. -	Design and implement APIs for audio/video streaming and playback. -	Conduct integration analysis and integrate media modules with our cross-platform learning system. -	Analyze and enhance system performance, stability and software quality.
requirement_others: Minimum Qualification: -	BS or MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent. -	3 years of experience developing media streaming and/or playback systems. -	Extensive knowledge of streaming protocols (e.g., WebRTC, HLS, DASH, DASH) and codecs (e.g., H.264/AVC, AAC, VP9). -	Solid understanding of HTML5 Video, MSE and EME. -	Working experience of streaming servers, such as TokBox OpenTok, AWS, Azure, and Aliyun Media Services. -	Fluency using Java and C/C++ in production environment. -	Strong communication, critical thinking, and problem solving skills. -	Excellent team player.   Preferred Qualification: -	Working familiarity with live streaming implementations. -	Working familiarity with the entire software development lifecycle. -	Demonstrated experience in building software on networking technologies and dealing with network issues. -	Technical knowledge of CDN architectures. -	Experience developing web or mobile applications.

company: 威朋大數據股份有限公司
title: 【Vpon Vorch Program】【暑期實習】機器學習實習生Machine Learning Intern
requirement: [What is Vpon Vorch Internship Program] V代表Vpon，為Vpon + Torch的結合 Vorch意味著Vpon將火炬傳遞給下個年輕世代，代表著不僅是帶領年輕世代認識數位行銷、大數據產業，更希望傳遞Vpon的核心價值觀：創業家精神、開放、利他 透過實習計畫的展開，為對於大數據、數位廣告產業有興趣的學生們提供認識與參與的機會，透過全方位的職場體驗，來累積職場實戰經驗；透過專案的參與進行，來累積自己在大數據、數位廣告的產業人脈圈。 最重要的，更有爭取成為正職夥伴的機會！  [About Vpon] 我們利用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 和統計模型 (Statistical Modeling) 從海量數據 (Big Data) 中挖掘各式使用者行為和能付諸行動的洞見與觀察 (Actionable Insights)，進而建立數據產品 (Data Products)，將其應用在廣告投放，電商成效優化、O2O 等各種領域。  [About Data Science Team] 我們是一群由電腦科學家、統計學家和心理學家等跨領域組成的數據科學團隊 (Data Science Team)，深信著 “Data Drives Transactions”。  團隊的發展重點為廣告競價平台 (Real-Time Bidding Demand-Side Platform) 、數據管理平台 (Data Management Platform)，團隊的使命是幫助企業提升顧客終生價值 (Customer Lifetime Value)。  [About Job] •	Develop/apply machine learning models to solve real-world challenging problems based on large-scale ad response data. •	Research on modern machine learning techniques to improve model performance.  [About You] •	BS/MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Math, Physics, Engineering, or equivalent experience. •	Good understanding of machine learning or statistical data analysis. •	Experience in feature engineering and building machine learning models.  •	Familiar with programming languages such as Python or R. •	Experience in at least one modeling framework such as R, Scikit Learn, TensorFlow, or Keras. •	Knowledge and experience in deep learning models is a plus. •	Do-er. Explore multi source and large scale data. Share actionable and novel insights from your model.

benefit: 【學習發展】 為協助員工快速融入公司環境與企業文化，系統化學習世界級IC設計團隊的知識及經驗，並有效發揮同仁志趣專長，加速提昇其工作上應具備能力，落實持續學習的價值觀，聯發科技藉由職能發展計畫，透過健全的訓練體系、多元的學習工具，鼓勵與刺激學習，且更進一步深入擬定個人發展計畫，作為培訓、考核及發展的基礎。搭配雙軌制的升遷制度，讓同仁能夠適才適所。  1.健全的訓練體系 不論是新進同仁、資深員工或主管，都有屬於自己的學習藍圖，在聯發科技，平均每年每位同仁所接受的訓練時數與經費，皆居業界領先地位。  2.多元的學習工具 透過在職訓練、職外訓練及自我學習等各種管道，我們不但提供系統平台與補助，更善用實體與線上穿插的手法，讓學習無所不在，也讓同仁和公司一起成長。  3.鼓勵學習的環境 為了讓同仁在工作中的創見、專業知識與解決問題的經驗，可以更完整地被保存與有效率的傳遞，創造最大的價值。公司成立跨組織的技術服務部門，辦理及獎勵論文與研究技術的發展，提供另一個學習與切磋的管道。　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　  【貼心福利】　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　 在聯發，我們高度重視員工的需求，提供同仁更無微不至的關懷與照顧，讓同仁享有各式各樣不同的貼心福利。以總部為例，多樣化的福利涵蓋以下四大範圍：  1.身心發展 在聯發全新的總部大樓當中，規劃有設備完善的專屬健康生活館，可提供同仁及眷屬平時及假日運動與健身的場地。並透過各項競賽活動的舉辦及舒壓按摩等服務，讓同仁達到真正的身心發展。  2.知性生活 在聯發，豐富的藝文饗宴，多元的生活講座，專屬的旅遊諮詢與優渥的補助，讓公司同仁一起開發潛能，豐富同仁的生活。  3.社群關係  在聯發，除了專屬於同仁的福利外，完善的社團資源，深度的社會公益，回饋於眷屬的關懷服務，讓同仁和家人、同事、社會更緊密連結，擴大幸福的版圖。  4.貼心服務 在聯發，我們提供便利的票卷訂購，完善的員工諮商協助，以及各項貼心服務（婚禮彌月調查，紀念節日禮品等），讓同仁在公司就可以把生活瑣事輕鬆搞定！

requirement: Backend Software Engineer是掌握產品Performance, Stability和Capability的魔法師，在不同的開發平台環境 (i.e., AWS, GCE, Azure) 不斷嘗試新技術進行performance tuning，追求單位系統流量(Capacity)極大化。尋找膽大心細的你！不只要求系統穩定，更願意為了一個更佳、更長期的解法，勇於嘗試再細心評估，為使用者開拓快速而寬廣的路徑，回應需求![Job Content]  Backend is the key component in product architectures. By using hybrid and responsive design, most UI are rendering from backend. Trend Micro Backend Software Engineers hold their professions on backend development, including system architecture, design, implementation, code review, and troubleshooting. Moreover, when delivering solutions, we focus on optimal system performance, better stability, and flexibility of scale out, thus skills about performance tuning, data compression, scheme design, and server development and architecture can equip us become backend experts. To hold better backend expertise, we take care network security by utilizing skills of network protocols, network packets, VPN proxy, and network data analysis to detect malware. To know users’ behaviors for system tracking and performance control like a DevOps role, we also analyze data by machine learning and deploy automation monitoring and testing tools.        [Challenge/Accomplishment]● 你將會面對到各式的開發平台環境，包含AWS、GCE (Google Cloud Engine)、Azure，隨著平台環境的推陳出新，更要主動研究新環境所推出的服務及應用模式，並透過內部backend專家的分享交流，讓原本後端系統/環境的運作效能因為我們的努力而更進化。● 我們不斷研究現有產品的功能，網路/系統運作流程，網路封包格式及VPN protocol等相關技術，並運用許多open source library的資料，讓開發出的軟體服務更經得起安全上的考驗。[Growth Path]● 為達到提升與管理網路安全和系統效能，Backend engineer跨界累積DevOps和Network Engineer相關領域，提升自身技術多元性與專業度。● 在趨勢科技，產品架構相對完整，當開發新服務功能時，Backend engineer將負責軟體架構設計，決定使用的軟體語言及資料庫類型，並將處理問題的經驗累積出多元的技術面向和整體規劃的能力，往Architect角色邁進。

Dare to change! 秉持沒有最好，只有更好的精神！

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

requirement: Working Location: Xizhi, Hsinchu office.  The Enterprise Presales, a.k.a. Solution Engineer plays an instrumental role in the solution research of IT vertical domain. In general, the SE is responsible for working with engineering team to develop application scenario and best practice with QNAP enterprise storage product line. In some cases, SE works directly with sales to assist project consult or their PoC.   As a Solution Engineer, you will:    • Research new cloud solution for IT application    • Proactively work out presale kits, including application note, white paper, solution brief, etc.    • Demonstrate products, solution to technical and non-technical audience     • Provide technical trainings to partners     • Provide PoC to partners and/or customers Solution area you cover:     • Linux, FreeBSD, Windows, Hypervisor (VMware, Hyper-V, or KVM), Network, Storage. Required Skills:     • Technical knowledge of Networking and/or Storage is required.     • Ability of project management is plus.     • An experience of VMware, Hyper-V, OpenStack, SDS or system integration is a big plus. An experience of enterprise backup (Commvault, Veritas, Nakivo, Veeam), video editing, IP surveillance is also a big plus.     • Business level English language skills to directly communicate with branch office is a big plus.     • Ability to travel with short notice.  About QNAP: QNAP Systems, Inc., headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan, provides a comprehensive range of cutting-edge Network-attached Storage (NAS) and video surveillance solutions based on the principles of usability, high security, and flexible scalability. QNAP offers quality NAS products for home and business users, providing solutions for storage, backup/snapshot, virtualization, teamwork, multimedia, and more. QNAP envisions NAS as being more than "simple storage", and has created many NAS-based innovations to encourage users to host and develop Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, and machine learning solutions on their QNAP NAS. For more information, visit www.qnap.com

requirement: 華新麗華再造工業典範（創新轉型之路）　誠摯邀請您的加入華新麗華成立於1966年，今年邁入第53年，回首過往的五十年，在見證世界從製造經濟走向知識經濟的同時，華新麗華亦竭盡所能的轉型精進，努力將專業與資源充分運用，創造多元且可持續的發展，期盼能成為經得起時代淬鍊、真正卓越的企業，為社會帶來關鍵、有意義的影響，而這樣的信念與使命華新麗華都必須持守、力行與傳承。 自90年代起，華新麗華積極在台灣與大陸設廠，以穩健、誠信之企業理念，逐步在兩岸線纜與不銹鋼領域中嶄露頭角；近年來，工業4.0浪潮來襲，是企業提升能力的時代機遇，藉由智能化的推進，我們期望能夠提供具有“匠人”精神的人才一個能夠發揮發光的環境，達成華新麗華在科技應用、精密工程、精實管理、市場導向以及以人為本的企業目標，這其中“匠人”精神更是帶動企業轉型與突破的關鍵。 　　匠人，指的是熱愛自己的工作，更不逃避瑕疵與失敗，一心只想著如何改善與追求極致，“用心做事”是他們的人生哲學，並希望將畢生所學傳承下去，這樣的態度稱之為「匠人精神」。我們相信，在各領域中皆有匠人，因此，我們努力尋找在各領域中的匠人，隨著策略工作的推動，發揮所長。1.進行資料清整, 並對企業需求提供資料分析, 建模與視覺化服務2.其他主管交辦事項工作
requirement_others: 1.具備關聯性資料庫、資料倉儲或 BI 系統 (ex：Tableau) 基礎知識。2.擅長統計及數學模型架構相關技能，或data mining/machine learning相關演算法。3.熟悉資料分析語言 (ex：R、Python)。4. 具備資料清整與處理不完整資料的經驗尤佳。

Assists other field and application/service engineers as appropriate.

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

title: Software Development Engineer – Framework
requirement: Amazon Device is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile devices like the Kindle family of products. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Amazon.com, Inc. Since then, we have worked to produce best-selling e-readers and tablets, as well as new inventions like Fire TV and Echo. What will you help us create? Work hard. Have fun. Make history.  The Role: As a Software Development Engineer – Framework, you will engage with an experienced cross-disciplinary staff to conceive, design and develop innovative consumer products. You will have experience porting Android to new platforms and providing a level of customization required to ship a differentiated product. You will understand what the limitations of the platform are and can design and implement additional services or help optimize existing ones to meet the product requirements. In this role, you will:   •	Have in-depth expertise working with Android distributions on consumer electronics products and dive into specific areas to root cause problems •	Work on integrating new Android pastries onto existing products •	Enjoy working side by side with partners, colleagues, and teams on tough problems •	Work on consumer electronics products •	Thrive in a dynamic environment with multiple, changing priorities •	Take great pride in innovating new products •	Know what's important when releasing software to end users and have been through the process from start to finish •	Work on an Android based product and understand how the Android software stack. Basic qualifications  •	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical field •	4+ years of experience in software development in Java or C++ •	4+ years of experience on Android framework •	Experience with embedded Linux devices Preferred qualifications  •	Master’s degree  •	Experience on Linux kernel, memory management •	Experience on system optimization •	Experience on Android ART VM •	Experience on Data Analysis, Machine Learning •	Experience on shell/python programming •	Experience interfacing with vendors, partners and outside contacts

company: 佳易科技股份有限公司
title: Staff SoC Design Engineer (Artificial Intelligence)
requirement: We're developing deep neural network computing chips across several industries. The Staff Engineer shall be responsible to go over the entire design implementation that covers digital design and SoC development targeted for the application of Artificial Intelligence from specification definition, design and integration, verification, tape-out and silicon characterization. The scope of work includes but is not limited to: •	Technically coordinate, work hand-on on digital logic design/verification in the development of AI SoC •	Work hand-on on SoC development and necessary digital logic design •	Be the interface to the analog design teams, support functions and stakeholders •	Drive innovations and optimization of the SoC design flow and methodology according to product requirement •	Take on the technical lead role whenever necessary and guide a small team of engineers •	Work together as a team to go through SoC design flow: SoC architecture and specification definition, SoC peripheral interfaces, power management, SoC integration and verification. •	Provide technical support to the physical design team who responsible for RTL synthesis, STA timing design, DFT, place and route and physical design. •	The ability to work with and develop relationships with multiple function groups and execute in a fast-paced environment is essential  Desired Skills & Competency Requirement:  •	Hand-on experience in the design and development of SoC •	Experience in designing artificial intelligence, machine learning, neural network, CPU/GPU/DSP-like accelerator or equivalent domain specific ASIC/SoC •	Ability to map neural network to custom hardware architecture and design •	Experience in deploying, implementing AI algorithm into ASIC/SoC/FPGA  •	Exceptional knowledge from SoC specification, design development, integration and verification is required.  •	Familiar with Verilog RTL coding &simulation, FPGA prototyping •	Programming skills with C, C++, python is an added advantage •	Familiarity with AI framework such as Google TensorFlow, Microsoft CNTK and Caffe is an added advantage •	Basic deep learning, machine learning or any AI algorithm knowledge
requirement_others: •	BS/MS in Electrical/Electronic Engineering or Computer Engineering required.  •	At a minimum of 8 years of experience in ASIC/SoC design. •	Knowledge & experience in the area of artificial intelligence, machine learning, neural network, CPU/GPU/DSP-like chip design

company: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
title: Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer
requirement: Dcard 致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，提供一個讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。為了達成這個目標，我們的資料工程師利用統計與機器學習方法，分析使用者產生的內容與閱讀偏好、設計演算法、打造各種資料產品，讓每個人每次打開 Dcard 的時候都能立刻發現有趣的故事。  在 Dcard 你將有機會可以接觸到⼤量⽤戶產生的實際資料。我們每⽉有超過一千四百萬不重複訪客，每天有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你所製作的產品將能立刻接觸到龐大的使用者，成為改善使用者體驗的關鍵，在他們的生活中創造一個美好的驚喜。  我們正在尋找喜愛思考與分析使用者需求、動手打造產品的資料工程師，加入我們這個熱愛挑戰的團隊。  【你的責任包括】  · 參與各式資料產品的設計與開發     · 例如：信息流 (Feed) 推薦系統、廣告推薦系統、搜尋引擎推薦、資料倉儲系統。 · 協助設計師、前端與後端⼯程師進行介⾯或使用流程的 A/B/n 測試。 · 提供管理團隊資料導向的業務分析。  【必要條件】  · 熱愛思考使⽤者的需求，將演算法動手打造成產品。 · 有良好的溝通能力，能夠清楚的表達想法，並與設計師、⼯程師團隊合作。 · 有三年以上的資料工程或資料分析工作經驗。 · 熟悉各式機器學習演算法。 · 熟悉使用 Python 開發。  【加分條件】  · 有 NLP 相關經驗、中⽂文字分析的經驗。 · 熟悉 GAN (Generative Adversarial Nets)、CNN 架構設計。 · 有資料視覺化 (Data Visualization) 的經驗。 · 有專案管理經驗。 · 有團隊管理經驗。 · 熟悉 TensorFlow/Keras/PyTorch/Caffe。 · 有大規模資料 (Big Data) 平台開發經驗。 · 熟悉資料 Pipeline 與 API 的設計與開發。  【投遞方法】 請至：http://grnh.se/ifr0uw1投遞， 我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。  【注意事項】 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡您！ 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知，謝謝大家。 重複投遞履歷，不會加快您的履歷處理速度喔～

requirement: We are looking for aspiring ML/DL candidates to join our team of researchers. The ideal candidate is open-minded, passionate about learning theory, and looks forward to challenge convention. Your ideas shall be based on sound mathematical justification yet lead to scalable and practical solutions.   In a flexible and supportive environment, one of your major responsibilities is to push the state of the art of learning theory. Furthermore, through collaboration with worldwide colleagues, you will have the rare opportunity to apply advanced Deep and Reinforcement learning theories to novel application areas from IC designs to everyday devices.  This is a technical role. It requires a high willingness to learn state-of-the-art signal processing techniques and a skill to quickly apply such learned techniques to novel applications.

requirement: Vietnam HR Assistance Manager 越南人資副理  About the role 有關這個崗位： -	Jusda is on the hunt for a seasoned HR Manager in Vietnam with startup experience and experience in logistics industry. 準時達現在招募一名對初創公司和有物流背景的越南資深人資主管。 -	This position will provide leadership in JUSDA Vietnam Company 這個崗位將會在越南準時達公司作為一個領導角色。 -	The role will align the local HR policies with JUSDA Headquarter’s policies. 這個崗位需要把準時達總部的政策和方向與越南對接。 -	Successful candidates will provide vision and strategic HR effort to JUSDA Vietnam in addressing critical human resources opportunities and challenges and assist the JUSDA Vietnam team to win every business opportunity. 成功的候選人未來要為越南準時達公司提供願景及策略性的人資力量以面對人資上的機遇和挑戰，並協助越南準時達去得到每一個商業機遇。 -	 Responsibilities: -	Identify, lead and partner with executive leaders to plan and implement HR policy that inspires and fosters high performance and high employee engagement, learning and innovation to accompany company goals and objectives. 和高層領導通力合作以製定並推行可促進員工表現、投入程度、學習及創新的人資政策，以達到公司的目標和目的。 -	Translate corporate strategy into executable HR operational plans 把公司的策略化成可執行的人資計劃。 -	Monitor organization compliance with laws and regulations 監察公司是否合規合法。 -	Create company strategic training and organizational development plan to meet personal, profession and organization needs of company employees and executives. 製定公司策略性的培訓與公司架構規劃，以期滿足員工和高管在個人上、專業上和公司上的需要。 -	Manage hiring process and all-rounded recruitment function 管理招聘流程及作出全方法的招聘。

company: 英屬開曼群島商麥迪創科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: Software Robotics Scientist – Mobile Robotics
requirement: Job description/overview   In Mindtronic AI we are looking for a talented robotic scientist to join our research and innovation team. As part of this team, you will get involved in the development of cutting-edge technologies for the automobile industry, working along with a group of young and dynamic researchers in a familiar environment, and facing new and interesting challenges. Joining Mindtronic AI means working in a international environment, collaborating with our many front-line partners in the automobile sector, and becoming an important part on the development of commercial technologies with a huge potential exposure.   Location: Taipei,Taiwan   Essential functions/ Job duties  Selected candidate will be in part of the development of a multi-agent command blending project. This development includes the design and implementation of a real-time robot software architecture, sensor fusion mechanisms, car control and safety routines, fuzzy system, and human machine interface.   Main functions include:  • Assist to design and implement vehicle navigation and autonomous operation.  • Develop and implement algorithms for vehicle control.  • Support AI team and help on AI system integration.  • Field-test experiment design and result analysis.  • Assist on product release, including certification process, integration control, customer support, and documentation.   Qualifications  • MS degree in Robotics, Mechatronics or related  • Mobile robotics - Including control (optimum control, predictive contro, ...), perception (sensor processing, object recognition, ...), and navigation (mapping, path planning, ...).  • Sensor modeling and Sensor fusion: Including sensors such as cameras, LIDAR, Radar, or ultrasounds.  • Strong programming skills in C/C++ and Python  • Experience on critical real time system architecture (mixed-priority multi-threading systems).  • Fluent communication in English.   Preferred Qualifications  • Related research/industry experience will be taken in consideration.  • Familiar with ROS and robot simulators (Gazebo or VRep).  • Sensor processing libraries such as OpenCV and PCL.  • Data analytics software (R, Matlab)  • Machine learning and Deep learning skills.   About us  MINDTRONIC AI Co. Ltd. is a start-up A.I. technology company founded in 2017 and has established an important partnership within automobile industry supply chain and ecosystem. Our research teams are located in Taiwan and the U.S. Our work is focused on Artificial Intelligence technology development, including Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, and Robotics applications, to bring innovative and revolutionary products to our customers.

title: ES_Data Scientist
requirement: SHL’s Engineering Solutions department is seeking a Data Scientist to support internal process development and building of an analytics platform to be leverage by key stakeholders across the organization.  The data science team will be analyzing data from across our large, international organization and working on fast-paced, high impact projects the effect the entire organization. Ideal candidates should have a background in working with data and communicating data findings in an industrial environment.  Strong experience with modeling, data scrapping, using/creating algorithms, and creating/running simulations is preferred.  The candidate should be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams.  The right candidate will have a passion for discovering solutions hidden in data sets and working with stakeholders to improve business outcomes.Responsibilities:1. Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive improvement and innovation.2. Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.3. Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.4. Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize production processes, revenue generation, insight into development process and other business outcomes.5. Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.6. Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.
requirement_others: 1. Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development.2. Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.3. Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.3. Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.5. A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.6. We’re looking for someone with 3-5 years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models, has a Bachelors (Masters, PhD preferred) in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another quantitative field.7. Experience with the following packages/frameworks a plus: Django, Sci-Kit, Numpy, Pandas

requirement_others: 1.專科畢，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。 工作時段： 三班輪班輪休制

company: 意藍資訊股份有限公司
title: 產品分析師 (資深/產品企劃人員)
requirement: 本公司運用語意分析與雲端技術專長，推出全國規模最大的網路社群監測與分析平台《OpView社群口碑資料庫》及《PeopleView人群資料庫》，廣泛地應用在行銷廣告、公關客服、品牌及市場研究上，能夠在數億筆的雲端資料庫內，精確地分析網路上的口碑聲量，以及消費者和市場的樣貌，是數位行銷時代重要的工具。我們持續拓展不同資料面向與產品的應用，歡迎對社群口碑討論嗅覺敏銳，對資料數據產業有憧憬的夥伴加入我們!!  本職務人員將負責意藍資訊所推出之產品發展及維運，主要工作內容包含： 1.(60%)社群口碑資料源之發展與維運，包含定期檢核資料源狀況，並進行資料源網站與頻道擴充，收納更多元的口碑資料。 2.(20%)社群口碑族群分析之發展與維運，包含定期更新族群口碑內容與功能開發，發展更豐富的網路族群口碑。 3.(10%)協助執行社群觀測或其他延伸產品原型製作，定義產品規格，可直接面對跨部門研發/設計團隊，制定開發時程、確保工作進度及品質驗證。 4.(10%)協助例行維運檢核，制定效能與維運成效監控指標。
requirement_others: 1. 細心有耐心，可獨立思考、自主解決問題之能力 2. 具良好的溝通與協調能力，可有效地掌握產品進度，如有實際產品/專案規劃與實作經驗者，請於面試附上相關佐證資料 3. 可操作SQL佳 4. 了解機器學習及語意分析之概念 (machine learning, language processing, semantic analysis)

company: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
title: Energy Algorithms Engineer
requirement: BackgroundGogoro is an ambitious new venture to change the way the world uses energy. Gogoro has deployed a first-of-its-kind energy network with over 500 battery swap stations, 50,000 electric vehicles, and 100,000 smart battery packs. This energy network is the foundation of Gogoro’s business, and with its design comes the opportunity to shape the future.Gogoro is seeking an energy algorithms engineer that will leverage data from our smart batteries to develop profound insight into this energy network, and create algorithms to manage gigawatt-hours of energy storage worldwide.Job DescriptionYou will be responsible for developing algorithms that manage a massive, intercontinental, distributed energy network of swappable smart batteries – the Gogoro Energy Network. Based on large sets of both real-time and historical network data, you will:• Create and validate models of hardware characteristics and user behavior.• Supply data analysis to motivate critical design decisions.• Design algorithms to optimize battery charging strategy.• Design algorithms to balance electricity pricing with battery supply and demand.• Design algorithms to optimize battery distribution among thousands of users.• Author strategies for influencing user behavior.• Build visualizations, dashboard, and reports.You will work closely within a cross-disciplinary engineering team to solve problems, discover trends, identify opportunities, and produce actionable insights into our network operations. You will be expected to help identify the factors that move key performance metrics such as battery lifespan, capital and operational expenses, and user experience.This position is an opportunity and a challenge to operate with freedom, and to leverage your own creativity in a rapidly growing new company. As an autonomous independent contributor, you individually will be expected to propose project scope and schedule, manage resources, and present your results to both technical and non-technical audiences.YouYou are fearless. You are prepared to work beyond the boundaries of your core expertise. You are creative and willing to take risks. You are thoughtful, methodical, and highly technical. You understand and respect the scientific method. You can leverage data analysis tools to automate routine work and to identify trends that are not visible to the naked eye.The Gogoro Energy Network is a highly non-linear, time-varying, multidimensional system. Analyzing its properties in concert with multi-faceted user behavior requires a dedicated individual like you who can model complex relationships in the presence of many confounding factors.You are motivated, reliable, thorough, and excited to transform the way the world consumes energy. You will be expected to operate with a high degree of autonomy, but be a clear, candid, and effective communicator in both spoken and written English and Mandarin Chinese.Required Qualifications• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or another quantitative field.• Skilled in the application of a programming language used for data analysis (e.g. Python, R).• Proficient in a database query language such as SQL, and basic database management.• A thorough understanding of probability and statistics.• Proficiency in English and Mandarin Chinese.
requirement_others: Helpful Qualifications• Experience with Lithium-Ion batteries.• Experience with machine learning algorithms and tools.Job LocationWork may be conducted from any one of our two Taiwan offices:• Songshan District, Taipei City• Guishan District, Taoyuan City

company: 思華科技有限公司
title: Data ETL/backend engineer
requirement: Silkrode Ads is a start-up company that makes it easy for businesses to use artificial intelligence to grow and succeed in a cross screen era. Silkrode Ads is formed by a passionate team of computer scientists and engineers with experience in AI, data analysis, distributed systems, and marketing.  We provide professional transnational corporate Internet information security application platform and consulting experience. Analyzing user experience with AI data to provide our customers. Our independent R&D center in Taiwan to placed great emphasis on increasing competitiveness of customers via stable, high-speed and security software services, as our ultimate mission.  •	Familiar with data processing (collection, cleaning, conversion, finishing, computing), and overall architectural design •	Familiar with any of RDBMS (ex: MySQL , SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle Database, etc.) is a must. •	Familiar with Linux, with Python or Java development capabilities, and ETL platform architecture •	Familiar with mainstream ETL tools, with practical processing of structured, unstructured data and integrated practice experience.
requirement_others: •	Work experience: At least 2-3 years hands on experience in data science field is needed. •	Experience in any of Linux-based OS and bash shell (ex: Ubuntu/CentOS, etc.) is a must. •	Experience in data modeling, data analysis and machine learning •	Experience with BigData and Machine Learning on GCP or AWS •	Experience in streaming development such as Kafka and Spark Streaming. •	Experience with MPP architecture system implementation management such as Cloudera, Hortonworks Hadoop, Teradata or Greenplum. •	Experience in Hadoop eco-system tools (ex: hdfs, hbase, yarn, hive, hue, spark, etc.) is a plus. •	Experience in NoSQL database (Mongo, Cassandra, Memcached, etc.) is a plus. •	Experience in any of AWS/Azure cloud servcie is a plus. •	Experience in DevOps eco-system tools (ex: GIt, Docker, K8S.) is a plus.  Why You should join: What do you get when you bring together the brightest minds and place them into an exciting, fast-paced environment that fosters intellectual growth and rewards based on impact, not tenure?  We’re growing our AI team if you’re a high-energy, engineer with hands on experience with Artificial Intelligence. Silkrode Ads is the place for you.  We embrace brilliance. We embrace independence. Join us.  What You’ll Contribute Build and evaluate predictive and decision models to be deployed in production systems, or for research. This includes the analysis of large amounts of data, determining suitability for modeling, data clean-up and filtering, pattern identification and variable creation, selection of sampling criteria, generating performance definitions and variables, performing experiments with different types of algorithms and models, analyzing performance, to identify the best algorithms to employ.

title: R-Senior Backend Engineer (台北/新竹)
requirement: 集團研發的系統包含了 DSP、ADX、DMP、SSP 完整的數位廣告平台生態系，服務範圍橫跨台灣、香港、東南亞等地。因為數位廣告即時競價(RTB，Real-Time Bidding)的特徵，我們採用混合雲架構（Azure, GCP 與自建機房），以降低網路延遲(Latency)。為了精準針對廣告受眾推薦合適廣告素材，我們也採用了 Spark、Kafka 與機器學習(Machine Learning)來打造背後的資料串流(Data Pipeline)。  負責工作： 廣告科技的 Backend 核心技術研發及維運  工作地點: 台北 大安區(信義/敦南) 或 新竹 竹北高鐵前  [ 工程師們為何要選擇加入我們 ?]  這裡有一群雖然低調，但務實地在解決商業問題的人，我們秉持著敏捷商務成功(Agile Business Success) 的精神，在努力的為台灣本土企業的軟體界創造新的可能性。  在這裡，研發工程人員不會單純只面對開發議題，也還需面對第一線的營運議題，以便於快速累積經驗並貼近市場需求。在這裡，工程師也不會孤單的面臨這些營運議題，除了落實當責，我們也講究團隊合作，也有跨職能的團隊一起在整條協作鏈中一起處理這些議題，以能成為專業並受顧客信任的商業夥伴為自我期許。  目前TenMax已正式站穩RTB生態系中的一席之地，除了已站穩台灣區原生廣告交易市場的前段班位子，除了擁有自擁流量之外，也已串接國際的廣告交易市場，目前更積極開發新產品的機會，以及拓展海外市場的新機會。  相關公司及產業資訊請參照: https://www.tenmax.io/archives/category/press-room

benefit: 我們搬了家，整體的裝潢設計為工業風。  所有同仁，在開放的辦公環境中工作。  人數不多，都三十上下，說話單純直接的互動。   有專業的營業用咖啡機，如果你懂，可以泡上一杯咖啡。  有個正對著窗外的休憩區，可以邊喝東西邊跟同事討論事情。  儲物櫃中會放著一些零食，工作累了，吃個義美小泡芙或維力炸醬麵補充精力。  附近有很多小餐館，午餐絕對不會愁著沒東西吃。  如果想自己帶，我們有水波爐跟烤箱，用電磁爐小煮一下也可以。   為了鼓勵同仁發揮創意，在VR展示區裝了58吋的大螢幕，  還買了PS4，從遊戲中學習是一定要的。  椅子很重要，我們知道。怕你工作累，提供人體工學椅讓你坐的開心。   一般員工應該享有的勞/健/團保/出差旅平險，是基本項目，就不提了。  每個員工生日當月有一天的生日假，也是應該的。  碰到婚/喪/育/三節，沒有發個禮金致意，說不過去。   每季一次的聚餐，所有人放下工作，開心的吃吃喝。  二年一次幫同仁安排健檢，有健康的身體，才有更好的未來。   希望每個在這工作的伙伴．都能開心、成長。

requirement: 尋找有統計分析與機器學習實作經驗的資料科學家, 以增加在資訊整合類型專案的分析能力  Responsibilities 	交易及網站行為研究，依據研究成果提出建議 	建立分析或預測模型以應用在CRM整合專案相關主題 	進行網站活動的成效追蹤分析，提出後續的優化建議 	運用雲端平台的功能，優化數據服務的維運流程 	對數據在CRM和線上資料分析領域的應用有興趣 	對於傾聽客戶聲音、分享對應的數據洞察有興趣 	能主動進行問題解析，並尋找可能解決方案 	希望能將數據分析或建模的成果，應用在真實的操作案例
requirement_others: Qualifications 	碩士以上學科：統計、數學、行銷、商科、資訊相關科系 	熟悉R或Python語言 	2年以上的數據分析以及建模的經驗 	至少1個從資料擷取、資料整理、資料分析到建立洞察或模型的實務經驗 	進階統計模型(Regression, Clustering, Segmentation...) 的應用經驗 	至少1個參與數據產品開發的經驗佳 	有 開發客製化分析模型或流程的經驗佳 	有製作商業智慧儀錶板的經驗佳 	有GCP, AWS 或Azure的使用經驗佳 	有Linux 指令操作經驗佳 	有使用SQL經驗佳 	熟悉 Machine Learning Model佳

company: 曉數碼股份有限公司
title: 【日本上市遊戲公司】HR 訓練發展專員 Learning & Development
requirement: 【不只是單純的HR T&D，而是重視員工職涯未來成長的引路人】  如果你對於一成不變的訓練流程覺得厭倦，想加深員工間的連結，建立趣味但意義深遠的研修企劃，並將員工的人生考慮在你的工作計畫內。 或是你想親上火線，分享你的想法，散播公司的文化，成為推動公司成長的幕後那一隻手 還是想針對員工的煩惱，你願意傾聽、分享、疏導，讓每個人的快樂就是你的成就感 抑或對於員工的職涯發展、目標設定、評價制度感到興趣，  人資企劃 - 一個能讓HR發揮創意，不再只有例行工作與文書作業，而是充滿挑戰的職位，正等著你的加入  成長與聯結，是曉數碼HR的首要任務，如果你熱愛分享，喜歡與人交流，那麼從員工加入，成長，甚至是離開，都將與你緊密聯結 你不只會是員工們的「Akatsuki 」- 黑暗中的那一道曙光，更有機會成為指引他持續前進的那顆「Akatsuki Heart 」  ---------------------------------------------------------------------  ◼︎主要工作內容： ・規劃員工職涯發展計畫 ・企業內外研修規劃 ・課程資訊安排、教材準備、教案撰寫 ・運用多類型管道及形式傳遞公司理念、建立、散播與發揚公司內部文化(Internal Branding) ・主動提案並落實員工訓練發展計畫 ・規劃、推動與改進員工績效制度 ・執行與改善評價系統，打造快樂的工作環境，與健康的職場生活 ・與員工會談，成為大家的心情傾訴站 ・新制度規劃與執行 ・其他主管交辦事項
requirement_others: ◼︎Requirements: ・英文商用程度（TOEIC 800）以上，聽說讀寫流利 ・具備一年以上Learning & Development經驗（產業不限，科技業或新創尤佳） ・能夠傾聽和發掘來自各職種的聲音，形成企業文化故事 ・溝通能力良好、應變能力佳 ・能獨立完成工作 ・負責任、有上進心 ・樂於接受不同意見、挑戰與嘗試 ・創意計畫發想 ・願意與人交流、充滿熱情、熱血與熱心  ◼︎Benefits: ・用超大投影幕打電動，各種公司內社團任你玩(當然是下班後) ・喝不完的咖啡、吃不完的零食 ・曉數碼圖書館不怕你看 ・每月公司福利活動 ・英文、日文的免費課程 ・溫暖舒服的工作環境 ・開放討論的工作氣氛 ・帥氣可愛美麗大方的同事們 (真心不騙)

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

requirement: SHL’s Engineering Solutions department is seeking a Data Scientist to support internal process development and building of an analytics platform to be leverage by key stakeholders across the organization.  The data science team will be analyzing data from across our large, international organization and working on fast-paced, high impact projects the effect the entire organization. Ideal candidates should have a background in working with data and communicating data findings in an industrial environment.  Strong experience with modeling, data scrapping, using/creating algorithms, and creating/running simulations is preferred.  The candidate should be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams.  The right candidate will have a passion for discovering solutions hidden in data sets and working with stakeholders to improve business outcomes.Responsibilities:1. Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive improvement and innovation.2. Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.3. Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.4. Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize production processes, revenue generation, insight into development process and other business outcomes.5. Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.6. Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.
requirement_others: 1. Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development.2. Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.3. Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.3. Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.5. A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.6. We’re looking for someone with 3-5 years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models, has a Bachelors (Masters, PhD preferred) in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another quantitative field.7. Experience with the following packages/frameworks a plus: Django, Sci-Kit, Numpy, Pandas

company: OK超商_來來超商股份有限公司
title: 儲備幹部(南港區)
requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。   培訓方式： 初階訓練： 店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。  進階訓練： 依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~10家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.具服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

company: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
title: 統計分析師/資料分析師 (高雄/桃園)
requirement: The Statistician/Data Scientist will be responsible for all advanced statistical methods utilized for improving product quality, production yield, and factory effectiveness as well as finding the root-causes, along with other consulting services such as customer targeting and lead scoring in support of sales and marketing activities worldwide.• Design, implement, and refine advanced statistical/Machine Learning models to support product quality improvement, increasing yield and factory effectiveness.• Cultivate strong relationships with production line engineers, IT, and other key stakeholders to ensure alignment of modeling initiatives with company objectives and to identify new hypotheses for model improvements.• Scale out modeling capacity by driving infrastructure improvements such as automation of data preparations, model training, implementation, and optimization.• Support integration of models into tools for use by product engineers and business analysts.• Engage with customers to develop and customized data analytics solutions to address special needs.• Address ad hoc queries from management and present actionable recommendations in a clear, concise, and convincing manner.• Communicate the application and benefits of using various predictive modeling techniques to improve decision-making to customers and stakeholders.• Collaborate effectively with team members, whether leading projects or supporting initiatives led by others. • Provide direction, training, and guidance to less experienced team members.
requirement_others: • Master or PhD degree in a field where there is intensive training in quantitative methods such as Statistics, Machine Learning, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Economics, Physics, Industrial Engineering, or Operation Research. PhD prefer.  • Research field in Design of Experiment, Response Surface Methodology, Survey Sampling, Time Series, Temporal Data, Bayesian Statistics, Survival Analysis, High Dimensional Data Analysis, Nonlinear Models, Linear/ Nonlinear Programming, Optimization, or Classification would be a big plus. A strong candidate must hit at least 1-2 fields above.• 5+ year experience (for senior) in successfully developing and implementing predictive models in the production environment.• Professional in SAS, R, Python, MatLab, or SQL, with practical expertise in programming and statistical modeling procedures including Linear Regression, Logistics Regression, Generalized Linear Model, Mixed model, Survival Analysis, and ARIMA model.• Demonstrated skills in data cleansing and transformations in the creation of predictor variables from complex data structures.• Knowledge of scorecard development, performance measurement, and business intelligence software solutions. • Detail-oriented and interested in applying quantitative methods to solving engineering and business problems.• Ability to thrive in a dynamic, collaborative team environment.
address: 高雄市前鎮區成功二路25號or桃園市復興路207號

requirement: About KKStreamWe, KKStream, is a KKBOX branch established in 2016 serving as the foremost video streaming solution provider in Asia. We provide scalable video platforms and enterprise solutions, now applied by companies including au, Japan and KKTV, Taiwan. We constantly monitor and measure our performance to sharpen and improve our work ways. We are proud of our work environment free from discrimination, and also strongly believe the diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees.SummaryWe're looking for video engineer/scientist to research topic by machine learning on adaptive streaming field, provide smoothness streaming experience, a.k.a. low start-up delay, low buffering rate and high quality viewing experience. You will work closely with video experts to do research of 1) building video specific data pipeline from scratch, 2) developing new machine learning technology for optimizing streaming quality. Furthermore, you may even participate in associated communities, e.g. Demuxed or Streaming Media West, to connect our team to the world. With our release of video streaming technique, you will be in charge of first-class adaptive streaming techniques in the world. What are you waiting for?!Duties and Responsibilities:* Researching machine learning for optimizing streaming quality.* Building video specific data pipeline on the cloud platform.* Quantifying quality and performance metrics of adaptive streaming by machine learning.* Partnering with internal teams to troubleshoot problem of research result.Qualifications:* 2+ years of relevant machine learning research experience.* Strong background in machine learning using supervised and unsupervised methods.* Intuitive understanding of machine learning algorithms, optimization methods and statistical tools.* Experience with TensorFlow, Torch and/or Keras.* Experience with Python and good coding practices.* Desire and willingness to continue growing your capabilities as machine learning engineer.* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.Plus:* Knowledge of adaptive streaming techniques, including DASH and HLS.* Experience with Linux is highly desirable.* Experience with visualization tools to represent statistics.

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

requirement: 1. 數位信號處理及數位影像處理(Digital Signal/Image Processing)2. 電腦視覺(Computer vision)及圖形識別(Pattern Recognition)3. 2D、3D 影像與訊號分析演算法針對電腦視覺或影像分析之研發及撰寫C\C#程式以達成應用需求，並測試及評估電腦視覺或影像分析理論的可行性。

company: 訊連科技股份有限公司
title: 人工智慧圖像技術工程師
requirement: 我們是一群愛好探索未知領域的研究者，利用現時AI/Machine Learning/DSP的嶄新技術，開發更先進智慧化的圖像處理系統。我們在做這樣的事：1. 研讀最新的期刊/研討會論文，瞭解目前最新的各種前端技術與演算法並加以改進與發想，應用在現有圖像和視訊處理的最佳化2. 揉合人工智慧的學習能力與圖像處理演算法，研發更先進的圖像分析識別與優化技術3. 以人工智慧與深度學習的方式改善圖像特徵擷取與識別、物件偵測與追蹤、影像自動強化、縫合、填補、與風格轉換等應用我們在找這樣的人才：1. 擅於以人工智慧進行圖像內容識別與影像處理2. 具電腦視覺/影像處理/人工智慧/機器學習/等相關背景知識優先3. 具有GPU運算(CUDA or OpenCL)撰寫經驗經驗者尤佳4. 對機器學習架構(Caffe, Torch, Theano and TensorFlow)有相關經驗者尤佳5. 熟悉 C++/Java/Python 程式語言設計6. 碩博士，具二年工作經驗者尤佳

company: 聖洋科技股份有限公司
title: R-DevOps/Site Reliability Engineer
requirement: 集團研發的系統包含了 DSP、ADX、DMP、SSP 完整的數位廣告平台生態系，服務範圍橫跨台灣、香港、東南亞等地。因為數位廣告即時競價(RTB，Real-Time Bidding)的特徵，我們採用混合雲架構（Azure, GCP 與自建機房），以降低網路延遲(Latency)。為了精準針對廣告受眾推薦合適廣告素材，我們也採用了 Spark、Kafka 與機器學習(Machine Learning)來打造背後的資料串流(Data Pipeline)。  你將需要負責以下工作： * 解決混合雲基礎架構的網路與作業系統問題 * 協助開發團隊使用 Ansible 與 Docker 部署數位廣告生態系相關服務與數據分析內部服務 * 使用 Prometheus 與 Grafana 監控整個基礎架構與資料串流的狀態  [ 工程師們為何要選擇加入TenMax ?]  這裡有一群雖然低調，但務實地在解決商業問題的人，我們秉持著敏捷商務成功的精神，在努力的為台灣本土企業的軟體界創造新的可能性。  在TenMax，研發工程人員不會單純只面對開發議題，也還需面對第一線的營運議題，以便於快速累積經驗並貼近市場需求。在這裡，工程師也不會孤單的面臨這些營運議題，除了落實當責，我們也講究團隊合作，也有跨職能的團隊一起在整條協作鏈中一起處理這些議題，以能成為專業並受顧客信任的商業夥伴為自我期許。  目前TenMax已正式站穩RTB生態系中的一席之地，除了已站穩台灣區原生廣告交易市場的前段班位子，除了擁有自擁流量之外，也已串接國際的廣告交易市場，目前更積極開發新產品的機會，以及拓展海外市場的新機會。  相關公司及產業資訊請參照: https://www.tenmax.io/archives/category/press-room

company: OK超商_來來超商股份有限公司
title: 儲備幹部(基隆區)
requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。   培訓方式： 初階訓練： 店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。  進階訓練： 依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~10家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。 區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.居服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

You’ll join an inspiring and curious team of technologists dedicated to improving the design, analytics, development, coding, testing and application programming that goes into creating high quality software and new products. And best of all, you’ll be working with and sharing ideas, information and innovation with our global team of technologists from all over the world.  Our Asset and Wealth Management division is driven by innovators like you who are driven to create technology solutions that make us work more efficiently and help our businesses grow. It’s our mission to efficiently take care of our clients’ wealth, helping them get, and remain properly invested.  Across 27 cities, our team of 4,600 agile technologists thrive in a cloud-native environment that values continuous learning using a data-centric approach in developing innovative technology solutions.  When you work at JPMorgan Chase & Co., you’re not just working at a global financial institution. You’re an integral part of one of the world’s biggest tech companies. In 14 technology hubs worldwide, our team of 40,000+ technologists design, build and deploy everything from enterprise technology initiatives to big data and mobile solutions, as well as innovations in electronic payments, cybersecurity, machine learning, and cloud development. Our $9.5B+ annual investment in technology enables us to hire people to create innovative solutions that will not only transform the financial services industry, but also change the world.

requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。 從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。  培訓方式： 初階訓練－店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。 進階訓練－依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責10~12家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。
requirement_others: 1.專科畢以上，科系、經驗不拘。 2.歡迎具服務業學習熱忱者加入我們的團隊。 3.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 4.須配合區域輪調。 5.工作時段：輪班輪休制。 6.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

company: NVIDIA_香港商輝達香港控股有限公司台灣分公司
title: Senior Mask Layout Design Engineer- Taiwan
requirement: We are looking for a Senior Mask Layout Design Engineer – someone who is excited to join a growing group of diverse individuals responsible for handling challenging high-speed mixed-signal circuit designs.  NVIDIA has continuously reinvented itself over two decades. Our invention of the GPU in 1999 sparked the growth of the PC gaming market, redefined modern computer graphics, and revolutionized parallel computing. More recently, GPU deep learning ignited modern AI — the next era of computing. NVIDIA is a “learning machine” that constantly evolves by adapting to new opportunities that are hard to solve, that only we can pursue, and that matter to the world. This is our life’s work, to amplify human creativity and intelligence.  What you'll be doing:  o	You will perform physical layout for mixed-signal functions like PLL's, high speed I/O circuits, general I/O's, ESD structures designs in state-of-the-art sub-micron CMOS technologies using Cadence tools o	You will work with ASIC and mixed-signal engineers to customize designs for integration in VLSI products. o	Job duties will include floor planning, custom layout and verifying against design rules and schematics.  What we need to see:  o	You have a BSEE with a minimum of 5 years of relevant mask design / layout experience o	Deep understanding of analog circuit layout concepts in submicron CMOS technologies o	You are an expert with Cadence custom circuit design tools - particularly virtuoso o	Experience running and debugging DRC and LVS with verification tools such as Dracula, Hercules, Calibre, Primeyield o	You are able to communicate in spoken and written English o	You are able to work effectively in a team, good communication skills, enthusiasm and positive energy. o	Proficiency in scripting languages like perl, python, skill etc. o	Knowledge of DRC and LVS checking flows, ability to customize DRC and LVS decks  We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

company: 台達電子工業股份有限公司 _DELTA ELECTRONICS INC.
title: Interaction Software Engineer(E4E)_台達研究院(台北)
requirement: Established in 2013, Delta Research Center (DRC) is devoted to big data analytics as well as the development and integration of applications and solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT) to enable the acceleration of enterprise transformation and upgrade. Meanwhile, DRC takes an open collaboration approach to actively collaborate with partners from industrial sectors, government agencies, academia, and research institutions for the mutual success of ecosystem.   We are seeking a self-motivated Software Engineer to play a key role in the design and development of our Cyber-Physical System for Smart Learning. The qualified candidate will contribute to build the next-generation solution of Education for Enterprise that elevates learning effectiveness through the use of hardware-software integration, human-computer interaction, immersive technologies, and learning analytics.   As a software engineer specializing in HCI/AR/MR, you will collaborate with the team to design, implement, and evolve the interactive learning system and tools.   Responsibilities: -	Partner with stakeholders and subject matter experts to understand learning and performance needs, especially in hands-on practice, and translate them into interactive training experience. -	Build, test, and revise prototypes in an iterative manner. -	Design, develop, and deliver the interactive learning framework, including tracking & feedback mechanics and interaction modalities.
requirement_others: Minimum Qualification: -	MS in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction or equivalent. -	Experience working on Unity or Unreal game engine. -	Hands-on experience with a variety of novel interaction devices, including visual, acoustic, and haptic control systems. -	Strong communication, critical thinking, and problem solving skills. -	Excellent team player. SAP HANA模組維運 2.	ABAP程式開發與維護 3.	發揮SAP HANA核心角色，協助POS、EIP進行系統與流程整合 4.	參與公司專案，配合人流、金流、物流進行資訊整合規劃  【工作經歷】 具企業SAP維運開發經驗(主FI/MM or SD+ABAP)

company: 美商泰優股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: Training Manager/ Learning Experience Manager 培訓經理
requirement: So what does a Learning Experience Manager really do? Think of yourself as the “Training Master”  that works in tandem with Operations, so not just anyone is qualified for this role! We make sure we get the best of the best, after all, we are a ridiculously good company so we make sure our employees are top notch. Now we need your full concentration because it’s time to imagine what it’s like being a Learning Experience Manager.  Imagine yourself going to work with one thing on your mind: that you will lead the design, development, and maintenance of existing and new applications to meet an enterprise’s functional business requirements and operational needs. As you tackle your new tasks for the day, you know that it comes down to one thing: that you will implement and enforce the development team’s guidelines plus processes.   As a Learning Experience Manager, you will manage the initiation, development, and implementation of the TaskUs training department’s site-wide initiatives and drive campaign specific training programs for Team Leaders and Teammates. You will also be a create and maintain any necessary materials related to maximizing campaign task mastery and personal development. You will be a pioneer of all campaign specific training needs and programs in the organization. You will also create and execute TL and TM development training which includes the following: detailed curriculum, training, and evaluation. You will provide campaign specific training that is sufficiently technical but engaging. You will act as the in-house expert, maintain all relevant training materials and documents for all levels for trainees; from new teammates to tenured team leaders. You will also ensure that all training provided is aligned with the specific campaign and TaskUs’ broader business objectives. You will also proactively explore the specific needs of every department and campaign to develop training materials as needed. What else? Well, you will also propose and publish a year-long training calendar with specific quarterly objectives. Lastly, you will also plan total training policies, programs, new testing tools, methods, and systems to ensure products and services meet quality standards while also working directly with the teams and communicate effectively with the Operations Director, Operations Manager, and their US Counterparts. So, do you have what it takes to become a Learning Experience Manager?  Requirements:  So, what is it we’re looking for? Well since this is a manager post we need someone who has at least a Bachelor’s Degree or College Degree in any field. You also need the experience so if you have at least 5 years of managerial and/or supervisory role -- then you're qualified!  We also need someone who’s excellent in presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills. You must also be highly independent and motivated with the commitment to oversee projects to completion and ability to adapt and level any training materials to given audience. Also, you must be knowledgeable in using Google and MS Office applications.
requirement_others: This position is responsible for delivering training programs for new and current employees on new products/services, selling skills, system changes and/or new business initiatives. Identifies gaps in training curriculum, obtains approval for resolution and takes action to correct.   Others: - Supervise training reports to the Training Leadership Team, and other appropriate managers/team leaders. Gets guidance from the Training Leadership Team on specific tasks, projects, and assignments.  - Makes recommendations on curriculum and content for Learning Management Systems/Learning Content Management Systems (LMS/LCMS).  - Directly supervises trainers and delivers corrective action if required.  - Delivers training programs to new and current employees. - Builds and maintains business relationships, as well as open lines of communication with our partners in Operations, Questors, and other support areas and internal Learning and Development team members/leaders. - Partners with the Instructional Design team by providing recommendations for instructional material and curriculum content changes, as well as new training interventions. - In charge of learning activities and professional development to improve individual skills - Can deliver training classes in both fluent English (up to Native level) & Chinese speaking is required. - Proficiency in the use of PC applications, Gmail, and Google Business applications (Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google, Slides) is an advantage - Ability to work on a flexible schedule including weekends, holidays, graveyard shifts. - High energy, enthusiastic, motivational training style. -目前暫無需輪值大夜班,但未來職務如有需求輪值,需能配合

requirement: Job Overview: Qualcomm's Multimedia R&D and Standards Group is seeking candidates for its Computer Vision, Extended Reality and Imaging R&D teams in Hsinchu, Taiwan. As the research organization of Qualcomm Technologies Inc., the group develops new algorithms and systems of computer vision, virtual reality, augmented reality and 3D imaging technologies for embedded system running in smartphones, auto and IOT devices. We are seeking candidates with strong knowledge and hands-on experience in visual signal processing, machine learning, imaging, 3D reconstruction, body and hand skeleton pose estimation. We are also seeking candidates with engineering experience in acceleration of embedded system with CPU, DSP, GPU and NPU. Candidates at different levels of experience will be considered.

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

Audio function design, implement and optimize for Unity, Unreal, software SDK, and so on.5.	Evaluate DSP chips and develop new audio features inside.6.	Researching and reviewing innovative techniques for spatial audio, speech, and noise processing.7.	Development of audio algorithm for Android base platform.

company: NVIDIA_香港商輝達香港控股有限公司台灣分公司
title: Senior Logic and Digital Circuit Design Engineer - Taiwan
requirement: We are now hiring for a Senior Logic and Digital Circuit Design Engineer Nvidia has continuously reinvented itself over two decades. Our invention of the GPU in 1999 sparked the growth of the PC gaming market, redefined modern computer graphics, and revolutionized parallel computing. More recently, GPU deep learning ignited modern AI — the next era of computing. NVIDIA is a “learning machine” that constantly evolves by adapting to new opportunities that are hard to solve, that only we can take on, and that matter to the world. This is our life’s work, to amplify human creativity and intelligence. Make the choice to join us today.  As a member of our Mixed-Signal high-speed I/O SerDes group, you'll be working on NVDIA's latest ground breaking technology that enables and accelerates gaming, artificial intelligence, deep learning, and autonomous driving. Your design will be consumed by standard as well as industry-leading proprietary high-speed protocols, and will serve as one of the key IPs in many complex SoC.  You'll work closely with analog designers and system architects to independently come up with micro-architecture specification and refine adaptation algorithms. You'll then implement the RTL in System Verilog, define test cases that will deeply verify the design and carry out test creations. Next is to define and build constraints for synthesis and drive for timing closure.  In addition to RTL design, you'll need to understand the analog schematics and write System Verilog models that collects the functionality of those circuits in the most precise way.  What you'll be doing:  o	You will be working with ASIC controller teams to define a unified interface. o	Help in streamlining workflows with proper scripts to increase efficiency and enables reusability. o	Be actively involve in silicon bringup, build scripts that can be used for debug, QA, characterization and ATE. •	What we need to see: o	You should have a B.S. or MS degree in Electrical Engineering with at least 8+ years of experience working in high-speed I/O digital design, knowledge at protocol level (SATA, PCIE, USB) preferred o	Have a deep understanding of Verilog or SystemVerilog, logic design and circuit modeling in RTL for mixed-signal blocks o	Experience with industry standard verification methodologies, such as UVM o	Experience with custom digital circuit design and adaptation algorithms, such as DFE, CTLE, CDR, and offset cancellation o	Experience with static timing tools (nanotime, primetime) and formal verification tools o	Have a strong background in Perl and Python scripting o	If you have a background in computer architecture and deep learning, this is a plus.

requirement: 1. Operates machine on a position indicated by Group Coordinator or Shift Leader.
