requirement: Job DescriptionLittle King is looking for Data Analyst to help 1) the production team find out the hidden patterns among data to improve manufacturing process and 2) fabric developers foresee the market trend and take the lead to innovate. As a critical fabric supplier to major sports wears brands, Little King works relentlessly to challenge and innovate ourselves. We gradually realize that data and the fact behind it will play a significant role in the near future while we differentiate our fabrics from others. Data collections are from various stages including material procurements, mass productions, inspection reports, and retail sales reports, etc.This position is responsible for applying appropriated statistic theories to analyze data, draw conclusions and contributing to automate the analyses if necessary. For various audience and purposes, the deliverables could be documents, reports, or data models. The discovered patterns will be used and guide the organization to do things under various scenarios.Main Responsibilities1.Create process to clean and organize raw data.2.Create reports, visualizations, or dashboards to explain data and present results.3.Draw conclusions based on statistic facts and identify possible root causes.4.Provide data models to assist decision making process.5.Archive analyzing process, methodologies, and statistic theories.6.Contribute to build platform for data collection, visualization, and model deployment.
requirement_others: 1.Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or equivalent practical experience.2.Demonstrated ability of analyze data and get insights to draw conclusions.3.Ability to express thoughts logically and succinctly via written documents and verbal communication.4.Familiar with R, Python or other analytical tools.5.Experience with Machine Learning will be a plus.

They will also be expected to work with other departments to provide copy for other business purposes as required, including marketing and internal messaging.  A minor part of the role (roughly 10%) involves translation work, including reviewing articles that have been translated from English and ensuring they are relevant for the local market, end-to-end translation of relevant global content, as well as any other internal document translation as required.  The successful applicant is someone who can work well within a remote team, take responsibility of their own workflow, and creatively contribute to the overall content strategy for the region. requirement: This position, either Jr. or Sr. professional, is a combined role of customer service and key account relationship. In addition, she or he owns a number of key accounts to manage. Timely and comprehensively addressing their inquiries, concerns and even complaints, the professional uses phones, emails, Zoom and/ or any other online/ offline means at work or home to communicate and to maintain satisfactory relationships with the major clients. When identifying unmet needs, she or he can work with Client Success Manager to cross-sell or up-sell by offering a product fit to the clients.   She or he will also act as an assisting partner to the Manager with work responsibilities ranging from translating customer inquiries and their corresponding replies into FAQ’s in English or Chinese, to updating Help Center and Service Alerts in circulation, to performing online chat, to doing some other administrative work related to sales and ad-hoc assignments by the Manager.   Cross-functionally, this talent will work with Marketing on digital communications, market surveys and on-boarding, with Finance on ERP and PO management, and with PM on trial and subscription account set-up.

title: ASIC/ Layout Design Engineer
requirement: At AMD, we push the boundaries of what is possible.  We believe in changing the world for the better by driving innovation in high-performance computing, graphics, and visualization technologies – building blocks for gaming, immersive platforms, and the data center.    Developing great technology takes more than talent: it takes amazing people who understand collaboration, respect, and who will go the “extra mile” to achieve unthinkable results.  It takes people who have the passion and desire to disrupt the status quo, push boundaries, deliver innovation, and change the world.   If you have this type of passion, we invite you to take a look at the opportunities available to come join our team.  KEY RESPONSIBILITY:  • Design and implement imaging pipeline block algorithms suitable for hardware, firmware and software solutions. • Evaluate the architectural design and algorithms for digital photography, computer vision or machine intelligence scenarios. • Closely work together with ASIC, firmware and software design teams to understand and improve the architecture and use cases for efficient and practical implementation. • Participate image processor architecture definition, deliver algorithm model/specification and analyze feasibility of technical and architectures. • Work with the image quality team to understand their requirements and to improve the designs.  • Participate in image quality tuning methodology development, improve customer satisfaction and image quality by solving technical problems, customer support and deliver optimization  • Collaborate and interface with local and global management, development and test teams to deliver a complete product solution  • Regular communication via Audio/Video conference with global teams  • Accountable on time delivery of deliverables    MINIMUM EXPERIENCE:  • BS-CS/BS-EE with at least 7 years' experience or MS with at least 5 years' experience in multimedia domain.  • Strong experience on Matlab/C++/C language with demonstrable Matlab/C++/C programming skills.  • Experience on digital imaging and computer vision methods and algorithms. • Experience in imaging and vision pipeline. • Understanding of image quality metrics. • Strong individual analysis, problem solving skills and teamwork attitude. • Fluent in both written and spoken English.  • Experience of working with multi-site teams is preferred.    PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:  • Experience on camera ISP ASIC, firmware, or software design.  • Multimedia/video/camera related system level knowledge and experience. • Deep understanding of machine learning or image/video processing algorithms for consumer photography or mobile applications. • Experience in array cameras, computational photography techniques, depth sensing cameras and others.    EDUCATION:  • Bachelor, Master's or PhD degree in Electrical or Computer engineering.

requirement_others: 1.專科畢，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。  工作時段：三班輪班輪休制
address: 桃園市龍潭區(依居住地配合輪調)
benefit: 正職/全職人員之福利與訓練制度：  【薪酬福利】 -每年依市場薪資水準評估薪資調整專案 -生日禮金(券)、三節禮品(券) -年終獎金 -特休假 -旺年餐會 -年度免費健檢 -員工旅遊及員工社團補助 -員工婚喪喜慶及生育補助 -傷病慰問、急難救助 -不定期員工團購優惠活動 -資深員工獎勵 -內部加盟優惠 -員工哺(集)乳室  【教育訓練】 -完善的新人訓練 -各部門專業訓練  【暢通的升遷管道】 -依個人表現每年評估兩次考績，並與晉升制度結合，發展機會佳。

requirement: Appier's mission is to make AI easier for everyone to use. To achieve this, we build AI systems to connect heterogeneous data in the cross-screen era, to process information efficiently while achieving our goals, and to solve new and exciting real-world problems. Are you passionate about AI, and looking to be part of this flourishing AI age? Do you want to witness how different types of data play a key role in concurrent AI systems and contribute to improving the capability of these systems? Do you want to build incredible AI systems and watch them grow to meet our product needs? If yes, we would love to talk to you. You will enjoy the excitement of working with our talented scientists and engineers to deliver next-generation AI solutions while growing together with our fast-paced startup.  Job Responsibility:  1. Build a flexible framework to speed up the development process of AI models 2. Turn exciting AI prototypes/ideas into products 3. Develop next-generation AI backend systems related to large-scale real-time data access, collection, analytics and monitoring 4. Continuously improve the quality of AI production systems

Write clean and maintainable code 4. Sufficient backend developement experience using Python in Unix/Linux environments  Nice to have 1. Familiarity of the machine learning flow of building a data-driven AI system, e.g. the steps for constructing a digit recognition system from MNIST database 2. Experience in query authoring and optimization of SQL/NoSQL databases 3. Experience with distributed computing and machine learning frameworks (Spark, Hadoop or Flink) 4. Experience with general purpose programming language (Scala or C++ is preferred) 5. Experience with one or more continuous delivery tools including but not limited to: Jenkins, Ansible, Docker.

company: Trend Micro_趨勢科技股份有限公司
title: 701: Data Researcher/ Analyst
requirement: 如果你著迷於處理巨量資料，加入趨勢就是你大展身手的好機會，在趨勢龐大的軟體架構下，有千萬筆巨量資料等著你，你將在團隊中扮演重要角色，將資料串接進系統，以巨量資料分析領頭，與資料分析師 (Data Analyst) 合作，洞察客戶意圖、掌握消費者需求，提供決策致勝關鍵。[Job Content]  • Design, implement, and enrich data processing pipeline that collect and process massive volume of data, to enhance Trend Micro solutions/services, protect our customers, and prepare data environment for data insight on business.• Investigate and resolve performance and stability issues in data processing systems and advise necessary infrastructure changes• Select and integrate data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities• By hacking big data to explore hundreds of real data collected from world-wide continuously, to get insight and discover new emergency threats.• Work closely with client application engineering teams, Data Analysts, marketing and business operation team for archiving business objectives.[Challenge/Achievement/Growth] • 資料工程師是開發團隊的顧問，要能從資料中洞悉出客戶需求及市場走向，給產品下一步設計上或行銷上的建議。 • 資料工程師在提供產品設計概念的階段扮演重要的角色，將和專案經理(Project Manager)有許多產品開發概念的討論，和研發經理(RD Manager)共同定義產品架構和規格。因此，專案經理及研發經理都是資料工程師未來的發展方向之一。• 有機會參與網路威脅防範(Threat)相關專案，提升資安技術，增加技術的廣度，更可以磨練及學習各種處理資料的新技術方法，提出Solution Architect等級的分析建議和解決方案。[Related Team/Project/Product]• Core Tech – SPN team (Smart Protection Network)• Consumer – WSE (Web Service Engineering) Backend Team• NTDTG – IoT Reputation Service
requirement_others: [Job Skills]Desired1. Proficient understanding of distributed computing principles2. Proficient in C++, Java, and/or Python. Have experience on developing data analysis or web service projects.3. 2+ years Unix-liked (Linux or FreeBSD) system administration and programming experience, able to automate tasks with (shell) scripts.4. Strong knowledge of server-side programming languages e.g. Python, Perl, Node.js, Go.5. Familiar with relational database and NoSQL database e.g. MySQL, Hadoop/HBase, MongoDB, Redis.Preferred1. Data mining, machine learning, or statistics related knowledge. Yes, we've got BIG data for you.2. Distributed computing knowledge (e.g. distributed filesystem, BigTable and MapReduce framework). We use and develop on Hadoop, A LOT.3. Threat security knowledge, including virus, malware, vulnerability, and web threat.4. Experience in huge data processing or data mining associated fields e.g. Text Analytics, NLP and Machine Learning algorithms.5. Experience in open source tools on Storage (Cassandra, Hbase, HDFS), Processing (Pig, Hive, Spark, Flink, Presto, Akka), Operation & Resource Management (Mesos, Yarn, Docker, Kubernetes), and Visualization (D3.js) 6. Experience with the AWS ecosystem tools and system level DevOps tools.

requirement: ‧ 你對機器學習、分散式系統有源源不絕的熱忱嗎?‧ 你擁有打不死的好奇心，喜歡耐著性子追根究底嗎?‧ 你擅長靈活思考與行動，不斷探索、驗證與思考如何突破瓶頸?我們正尋找擁有這樣特質的你……一起扮演現代福爾摩斯，加入趨勢科技Core Tech Holmes Project!在這個團隊，你可以~* 悠遊於千萬筆的Real Data中，分析全球網路使用者行為及日新月異的病毒資料* 從龐雜無盡的資料中找出潛在的抽象規則，依據數據結果設計並建構模型來提供解決方案、預測使用者/病毒行為* 透過與其他軟體研發人員的合作，參與趨勢核心threat projects, 提升資安相關的技術和問題處理流程，以增加技術的廣度利用  Machine Learning及Deep Learning ，讓我們一起來訓練智慧的科技腦。透過資料學習，不斷調整模型的構成，抽絲剝繭，從平凡中挖掘黑暗威脅的跡象。讓我們一起來發揮資料的技術力，在巨人的肩膀上發現問題的脈絡，創造AI大未來!Welcome to join us! Be one of our Holmes!Seeking for candidate who is able to create scalable solution by applying machine learning techniques for customer-facing problems.1. Will be dealing with huge amount of data to identify new type of fast-changing internet threat2. Will closely work with development team to express the novelty ideas and turn it into productive solution to solve the real world case.3. Will closely communicate with Operation and Field Support to understand customer-facing problems and optimize the machine learning techniques to solve customer’s problem4. Will research on innovative machine learning technique that could solve real world challenging cases

company: 英屬開曼群島商麥迪創科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: Software Robotics Scientist – Mobile Robotics
requirement: Job description/overview   In Mindtronic AI we are looking for a talented robotic scientist to join our research and innovation team. As part of this team, you will get involved in the development of cutting-edge technologies for the automobile industry, working along with a group of young and dynamic researchers in a familiar environment, and facing new and interesting challenges. Joining Mindtronic AI means working in a international environment, collaborating with our many front-line partners in the automobile sector, and becoming an important part on the development of commercial technologies with a huge potential exposure.   Location: Taipei,Taiwan   Essential functions/ Job duties  Selected candidate will be in part of the development of a multi-agent command blending project. This development includes the design and implementation of a real-time robot software architecture, sensor fusion mechanisms, car control and safety routines, fuzzy system, and human machine interface.   Main functions include:  • Assist to design and implement vehicle navigation and autonomous operation.  • Develop and implement algorithms for vehicle control.  • Support AI team and help on AI system integration.  • Field-test experiment design and result analysis.  • Assist on product release, including certification process, integration control, customer support, and documentation.   Qualifications  • MS degree in Robotics, Mechatronics or related  • Mobile robotics - Including control (optimum control, predictive contro, ...), perception (sensor processing, object recognition, ...), and navigation (mapping, path planning, ...).  • Sensor modeling and Sensor fusion: Including sensors such as cameras, LIDAR, Radar, or ultrasounds.  • Strong programming skills in C/C++ and Python  • Experience on critical real time system architecture (mixed-priority multi-threading systems).  • Fluent communication in English.   Preferred Qualifications  • Related research/industry experience will be taken in consideration.  • Familiar with ROS and robot simulators (Gazebo or VRep).  • Sensor processing libraries such as OpenCV and PCL.  • Data analytics software (R, Matlab)  • Machine learning and Deep learning skills.   About us  MINDTRONIC AI Co. Ltd. is a start-up A.I. technology company founded in 2017 and has established an important partnership within automobile industry supply chain and ecosystem. Our research teams are located in Taiwan and the U.S. Our work is focused on Artificial Intelligence technology development, including Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, and Robotics applications, to bring innovative and revolutionary products to our customers.

company: Asurion Taiwan_香港商亞勝通訊有限公司台灣分公司
title: Soluto Content Writer (Taiwanese Mandarin)
requirement: Job Purpose  The Soluto Content Writer is responsible for helping customers get more from their technology by authoring high quality Mandarin Taiwanese content for multiple engagement channels, including our Soluto technical support app and web platform.   They will work closely with the Soluto Content Manager to determine content needs and identify opportunities to drive and improve customer engagement of content through data analytics, split testing, alternate messaging and other marketing approaches. They will also be expected to work with other departments to provide copy for other business purposes as required, including marketing and internal messaging.  A minor part of the role (roughly 10%) involves translation work, including reviewing articles that have been translated from English and ensuring they are relevant for the local market, end-to-end translation of relevant global content, as well as any other internal document translation as required.  The successful applicant is someone who can work well within a remote team, take responsibility of their own workflow, and creatively contribute to the overall content strategy for the region.  Key Accountabilities  •	Research, author and publish Taiwanese Mandarin content up to and including the final draft on a weekly basis. •	Stay current on market trends and technology to identify content needs. •	Design and deploy campaign management activities including A/B testing, segmenting, and the development of opportunities to discover marketing best practices •	Analysis and reports on campaign/notification effectiveness and engagement scores •	Stay abreast of content marketing trends and change directions quickly if necessary •	Work with multiple teams across the organization to develop engagement strategies for customer-facing content •	Regular review of existing content to ensure relevance and quality •	Work with designers to ensure each communication adheres to brand and style guidelines •	Review translated content and ensures that ensures it meets local standards. •	Provide other translations of English content as required  Any other responsibilities as directed by your manager.
requirement_others: •	2+ years of professional writing experience in a customer-facing content role •	Fluent in English and Taiwanese Mandarin (written and spoken) •	Passion for technology •	Love of learning and willingness to engage in ongoing learning  •	Excellent communication skills via face to face and electronic formats •	Strong team player •	Ability to function independently as a member of a remote team •	Excellent attention to detail

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

requirement: This position is responsible for delivering training programs for new and current employees on new products/services, selling skills, system changes and/or new business initiatives. Identifies gaps in training curriculum, obtains approval for resolution and takes action to correct.   Job Description  - Prepares and submits daily training reports to the Training Leadership Team, and other appropriate managers/team leaders. Gets guidance from the Training Leadership Team on specific tasks, projects, and assignments.  - Makes recommendations on curriculum and content for Learning Management Systems/Learning Content Management Systems (LMS/LCMS). Prepares develops and conducts personal one-on-one training and development plans for teammates. - Directly supervises new hire trainees and delivers corrective action if required.  - Delivers training programs to new and current employees: - Maintains records of attendance, coaching and development documentation, as well as corrective actions. - Builds and maintains business relationships, as well as open lines of communication with our partners in Operations, Questors, and other support areas and internal Learning and Development team members/leaders. - Partners with the Instructional Design team by providing recommendations for instructional material and curriculum content changes, as well as new training interventions. - Participates in learning activities and professional development to improve individual skills
requirement_others: - At least 1-2 years of working experience in the related field is required - Can deliver training classes in both fluent English & Chinese speaking is required. - Proficiency in the use of PC applications, Gmail, and Google Business applications (Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google, Slides) is an advantage - Ability to work on a flexible schedule including weekends, holidays, graveyard shifts. - High energy, enthusiastic, motivational training style.

company: OK超商_來來超商股份有限公司
title: 儲備幹部(宜蘭區)
requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。   培訓方式： 初階訓練： 店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。  進階訓練： 依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~10家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.具服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。
address: 宜蘭縣宜蘭市宜蘭地區
benefit: 正職/全職人員之福利與訓練制度：  【薪酬福利】 -每年依市場薪資水準評估薪資調整專案 -生日禮金(券)、三節禮品(券) -年終獎金 -特休假 -旺年餐會 -年度免費健檢 -員工旅遊及員工社團補助 -員工婚喪喜慶及生育補助 -傷病慰問、急難救助 -不定期員工團購優惠活動 -資深員工獎勵 -內部加盟優惠 -員工哺(集)乳室  【教育訓練】 -完善的新人訓練 -各部門專業訓練  【暢通的升遷管道】 -依個人表現每年評估兩次考績，並與晉升制度結合，發展機會佳。

company: 香港商睿智通有限公司台灣分公司
title: Dev Ops Engineer
requirement: Job Description Dev Ops Engineer supports SW team with dev cycle automation administration & development. Supports the software team by implementing & deploying environments. Build and development tools. Test, log, and continuous integration tools. Implementing planned DevOps system improvements. Responding to support requests from the dev (and test) teams.  You will be working alongside founders, researchers, and engineers to design and build first-generation robotic solutions for mass consumer adoption.  You will be measured by contributing to deliverables, SW and Test dev efficiency, as measured by (for example) ease of/ time waiting for code-compile-test or test-analyze-report cycles.   Requirements  Experience: Bachelors degree in CS / CIS / IT or equivalent experience. Experience with CI/CD integration pipelines and build tools such as Jenkins, Drone, Travis. Experience in automation or administrative tasks, by leveraging Linux, Python, Shell Scripts.  Mandatory Requirements: Strong experience with automation and support of DevOps tools. Ability to assist in developing scripts, hooks, and tools within the company's code to support coding and debugging is also a plus.  Since we're a startup, ability to overlap with "test ops" having to do more with fast system deployment and data aggregation and analysis from physical test environments is also a plus.  Preferred Requirements: 3+ years experience supporting dev teams of > 20 people strongly preferred.  Experience with configuration management tools such as Chef, Ansible, Puppet. Experience with C++ and cmake strongly preferred, catkin preferred.  Company Description:  Aeolus Robotics was founded to bring the first generation of household robot assistants to life, and to market. Integrating prowess from world-leading Taiwanese manufacturers with Silicon Valley AI genius, we are breaking ground in general-purpose consumer robotics with capability in unstructured “human” spaces. Our CTO, an expert in AI and machine learning, led the DARPA effort that spun out the Watson AI project.  We invite top-notch people with a passion for robotics to join us in this technical adventure. Among our many open positions (http://aeolusbot.com/careers) you may just find your dream job, so make sure to check the whole list!  As a well-capitalized start-up we have demonstrated our prototype robot at CES 2018, and have additional key members and breakthrough technological approaches to ensure success in this challenging field. Check our website for more, and search the web for "Aeolus Robot" to find some of the many articles and videos about our prototype demonstrations.

requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。   培訓方式： 初階訓練： 店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。  進階訓練： 依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責4~10家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。 區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.居服務熱忱，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。

requirement: 若水AI數據服務團隊，致力於提供安全、快速及高品質的標注數據(ground truth datasets) 做為各式機器學習及AI應用。 我們以「挖掘世界潛在的智慧，為AI引擎提供高品質訓練數據」為願景，專注於開發一個針對電腦機器學習的數據優化平台，配建多元標註工具及完善品管系統，透過專業數據處理師的標註，讓電腦能精準學習，模擬人類所思所想，並做出決定。 客戶類型涵蓋人臉辨識、電子商務，及新興的自動駕駛...等AI 服務商。在創辦人趨勢科技董事長張明正的全力支持下，我們加速模型學習，並為AI工程師與數據科學家帶來無限便利。  About the role: • Collaborate on estimates, database schemas, front-end mockups, and architectural decisions for human-in-the-loop tools. • Build & improve code across the entire stack (php,python, javascript) for the existing data management platform • Design, develop and deploy front-end tools such as interactive interfaces as well as back-end solutions such as APIs and post-processing pipelines. • Collaborate with teams to provide insightful data via reports or dashboard, to assist the whole team in objective and performance analysis • Promote strong engineering principles including writing DRY code, test-driven development (unit, functional and end-to-end testing), code reviews, and continuous deployment.  You’re not just looking for a job, you’re looking for an innovative product where you can make a large impact.
requirement_others: Requirement: • BS or MS degree in Computer Science. • 3+ years of applied software engineering experience (especially in startups). • Good knowledge and experience with git version control and software development flow. • Experience with front-end frameworks like Vue, React or Angular as well as component libraries like Bootstrap, Semantic or Material. • Experience of developing backend APIs using any language and web frameworks. • Experience of deploying production-level code to a cloud environment such as AWS or GCP • Experience with any RDBMS and knowledge on SQL optimization and relational data structure design  Plus: • Experience with any NoSQL DB • Experience with Serverless back-end architecture or Microservice architecture design • Experience with Scrum/Agile development methodologies. • Experience with software testing and test automation tools • Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins • Experience with infrastructure automation technologies like Docker and Kubernetes • Experience with or knowledge on digital image/sound processing • Experience with or knowledge on machine learning

benefit: ●	職缺與徵才 因為你期待無限可能，所以選擇陽程。在這裡，你會看到陽程同仁奮而不懈地追求技術的精進，製造的卓越，以及客戶服務的優化。如果你是機械設計人才，擁有「無限創意」，加入我們，你將成就「薪酬無界」的理想；與產業菁英共事、勇於接受面對挑戰，並透過完整的學習發展計畫，充分發揮你的潛能。只要表現合乎公司期許，公司將相對給予優渥薪酬鼓勵，你將有機會享有優於同業的整體薪酬，以及發掘陽程生活的多元與樂趣，享受工作與生活的平衡。  ●	福利措施  ■ 優質之整體薪酬  	陽程科技 ( USUN) 的整體薪酬維持在同業水準之上，除設有端午節、中秋節、年終獎金及固定調薪等外，並秉持利潤共享的理念，依營運績效發放獎金、績優同仁獎金、員工配股、限制型股票、庫藏股、現金增資、員工認股優先、現金分紅、激勵獎金及部門聚餐基金等績效獎酬。   依法令之休假   	除法定特休假、陪產假及生理假外，陽程科技 ( USUN) 另參考政府機關行事曆週休二日。     全方位保險保障   	提供勞保、健保、國外出差旅遊平安險及員工免費團體保險 ( 壽險、意外險、醫療險、職業災害保險 ) 等全方位之保險，讓同仁無後顧之憂。    外縣市同仁宿舍(津貼)   	為避免外縣市新進同仁在進入陽程科技 ( USUN)之初，能免除尋找住處之困擾，公司提供外縣市同仁，在外租房，則可申請租屋補助金，讓同仁在初來乍到之際，能更專注於新工作與新環境的調整與適應。(外縣市或居住地離上班地點30公里以上同仁可申請租屋補助)    五星級精緻餐飲   	陽程科技 ( USUN)自辦員工餐廳，提供免費午間、晚間精緻餐飲以及舒適的用餐環境，除了兼顧營養與衛生，並免除外出用餐的不便與困擾，讓您可養精蓄銳地面對工作與挑戰。   貼心之健康照護   	為提醒您關注個人之健康，陽程科技 ( USUN) 每年定期舉辦高階主管、一般同仁等兩項免費健康檢查，並有專業護士把關並守護同仁的健康。   舒適的工作環境      ■	優美與舒適明亮的環境，是陽程科技 ( USUN)的同仁對於我們工作環境一致的感受! 除了有讓身心靈放鬆的免費咖啡、休閒室，另外還有隨處可見的美麗植栽，愉悅的心情可以使您的工作效率加倍！  免費的停車場    為體恤同仁上班尋找停車位之困擾，陽程科技 ( USUN)提供免費汽機車位，並以全天24小時監視系統維護安全。  ■ 各項禮金補助 陽程科技 ( USUN)體認同仁是公司最大資產，成立「職工福利委員會」，每年五一勞動節、三節固定發放禮金或禮劵，同時按公司規定提供同仁結婚 / 彌月賀禮 /喬遷之喜 / 喪葬 /公傷慰問金 / 生日禮金 / 教育獎學金補助 / 員工國內外旅遊等各項補助。  ■ 托兒津貼補助    為協助同仁解決托兒問題，以穩定勞動生產力，並落實性別工作平權，公司提供年度補助托兒津貼，並與托兒服務機構簽約辦理托兒服務。   豐富之社團活動   	多樣的社團活動，如撞球社、桌球社、棒壘社、保齡球社、攝影社等，讓您在工作之餘也能從事自己喜愛的休閒活動。   公司活動   	1. 提供固定額度的自選式福利方案，可以依您的個人喜好選擇國內外旅遊補助等內容。  	2. 舉辦漆彈比賽、中秋烤肉餐會、聖誕餐會、壘球比賽、年終尾牙等各式活動，讓您的生活更多彩多姿。  	3. 眾多休閒娛樂等特約商店折扣。   ● 學習與發展    結構化在職訓練   	重視員工的學習與發展，並系統化地規劃員工的訓練發展。依據員工之工作職責、績效發展、組織策略等面向規劃年度訓練計劃，提供員工增進工作技能與知識之通識訓練、專業訓練、職能訓練等內外訓課程。  ●陽程生活  ■ 樂活休閒    我們相信為員工塑造一個兼顧工作與生活的優質環境，能為企業帶來更多活力與成長。對陽程同仁而言，生活的豐富和專業的成就同等重要；從食衣住行的滿足到精神層面的提升，陽程同仁在公司生活獲得充分的照顧。

requirement: 研究所以上數學、應數、資工、通訊相關系所組畢。  技能需求【必備】： 1. 具備C/C++程式語言能力。 2. 具備matlab/octave/python程式語言能力。 3. 具基礎英文能力，可閱讀paper相關文獻，並可實作。(用C/C++/matlab/octave/python) 4. 個性樂觀，願意接受挑戰，願意與成員分享技術，與其他成員溝通無礙。  技能需求【應用數學/數學】： 1. 熟悉以下科目-線性代數、微積分。 2. 修習過以下科目或有同等能力-高等微積分、數值分析、微分方程、機率統計。  技能需求【資訊工程】： 1. 修習過以下科目或有同等能力-計算機組織、資料結構、演算法、編譯器。  技能需求【加分】： 1. machine learning相關知識。 2. 熟悉Unix/Linux環境，會寫shell script、makefile。 3. svn/git/cvs等版本控管系統。 4. 物件導向程式設計。 5. 有使用過開發板(如Raspberry pi,  Arduino...)，具備基本中斷知識以及控制週邊元件經驗。 6. 使用過任何open source的lib開發經驗(如ffmpeg, libxml ...等)，具備環境建置以及基本測試能力。 7. mult-thread或是其他平行處理的開發經驗。 8. I2C/SPI/USB傳輸介面基礎知識。 9. 修習過以下科目或有同等能力-影像處理、訊號處理、最佳化理論、自適性濾波器。  工作內容： 1. 觸控演算法開發。(包含實作以及研究方法) 2. 參數調整。(手動或是使用自動化方式) 3. 研讀論文以及專利，以開發新方法。 4. 主管交辦事項。  備註： 1. 三年以下請準備大學/研究所成績單。 2. 無工作經驗者請準備畢業論文。 3. 此職缺希望有良好數學能力。 4. 若非上述提及科系若有同等能力者也歡迎加入我們。 5. 上述技能需求【必備】部分需要皆具備，而【應用數學/數學】以及【資訊工程】擇一。

company: Tomofun_友愉股份有限公司
title: Senior AI engineer
requirement: 【 About the role 】 We are looking for a computer science major, master’s or PhD with a focus on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, who has dealt with several technologies or applications in his personal or professional life. Published journal papers, competition winners (i.e. Kaggle), deployed products or applications using Artificial Intelligence are a big plus. We are looking mainly, but not limited to, image recognition and audio processing using machine learning.  【 About the company 】: At Tomofun, we LOVE pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and innovation to every pet lover in the world. Headquartered in Taiwan, we’re building a one-of-a-kind global company that helps pets and pet parents stay connected through our innovative products. Our pioneer product, Furbo Dog Camera, is the #1 best selling pet camera on Amazon US, Canada, UK, and Japan and also recommended by The Ellen Show as the #1 gift on every pet-lover’s Amazon wishlist. The learning curve is steep. But the work is exhilarating. Tomofun is on the cusp of a pet-tech boom and we’re looking for smart, innovative thinkers who aspire to incredible things.  【 What you'll do 】 ・Give guidance to AI members on the direction of research or ML models prototyping  ・Work with PM and AI team members to identify the business requirement and propose the solutions and build up AI or ML prototype ・Write, train and deploy successful machine learning models either on the cloud or on embedded systems (experience in embedded systems is a big plus) for voice and image recognition. ・Maintain and improve existing technologies and models ・Stay up to date in current technologies and state of the art methods for in house application. ・Collect and arrange specialized data for training and validation purposes ・Full stack developer able to implement a solution from start to end  【 Who you are 】: ・You’re not just looking for a job, you’re looking for an innovative product where you can make a large impact ・Have a passion for and deep experience in Artificial Intelligence, machine learning.  ・Thrive in an agile development process ・Look forward to joining a high caliber team of machine learning experts.  ・You’re self-driven and set high expectations for yourself ・You take ownership and sweat the small stuff ・You thrive on constructive feedback ・You insist that facts drive decisions ・You deliver results that matter. ・Sharp, motivated co-workers in a fun office environment. ・Able to communicate freely in both English and Mandarin with your team.   【 Perks】 - You can bring your pet to the office so that they will never be home alone again :) - The rare opportunity to work with an international team who have a passion to change the world. - A LOT of free snacks and drinks for humans and pets! - Smart and friendly team members. We’re going to have fun together EVERYDAY! - Comfortable and creative working environment with sofa and kitchen. It’s just like your home! - Plenty of activities such as pizza day & monthly birthday party!  【 Benefits 】 - Medical insurance and free yearly health checkup - Unlimited vacation policy; work hard and take time off when you need it. - 2 free Furbo are given to each full-time team member. - Afternoon tea time twice a month and birthday party every month. - Tomofun library is full of interesting books that you can borrow anytime you want. - You’re welcomed to join our volunteer program. We are a group of people who is passionate to give back to society. - Company trip and employee outing program. - Monthly meeting and lunch party. Life is not only work in Tomofun. - Internal training workshop and external training subsidy let you expend your skill set. - Flexible working hours. No more clock in or out ! - There’re always adorable dogs and cats in the office. You’ll never get bored in Tomofun.

company: 上準微流體股份有限公司
title: Software Engineer
requirement: At MiCareo, we are working on an innovative medical instrument for detecting rare cells in blood sample. That means that out of the 5 billion cells there are in 1 mL of blood, we are able to detect the very single cell that may give doctors crucial information about their patient. An important application for this technology is developing better treatments to fight against cancer : it allows doctors and researchers to identify precisely the different types of cancer and know what treatment will work for the patient.   Our solution includes multiple components distributed on different computers. We are now looking for a software engineer to help us improve the integration and deployment of those components and implement a reliable software to synchronize data between the different computers.   Tasks include: - Develop software for automatic transfer and synchronization of large data between two computers - Develop software for managing the interface between different modules written in different languages (Labview, Python, Java)  and located on different computers - Implement tools for software deployment and system configuration - Implement tool for Improving our development process (automated tests, CI/CD, ...)   It is expected that all members of the team go beyond their responsibilities and help to improve the whole project: - Help improving the global software design (Take an active part in the whole software design process) - Come up with great ideas, new solutions to existing problems or completely new features - Eventually help other engineers on their projects, such as : web programming, instrument automatic control, image algorithms, data analysis, etc...   Requirements: - Good knowledge of software engineering and design patterns - Object Oriented Programming (experience with Java is preferred)  - Experience with Continuous Integration and Deployment (using Jenkins for example) and/or installation software  - System administration and scripting for Windows and/or Linux
requirement_others: Experience and interest in one or multiple of the following would be considered a plus : - Scripting and programming using Python - System security - Web programming - Software Documentation writing and Software certifications (ISO, IEEE, FDA, ...) - Data analysis and machine learning ; Image processing - Cellular Biology

company: Amazon Web Services Taiwan Limited_台灣亞馬遜網路服務有限公司
title: Big Data/Machine Learning Architect
requirement: Introduction Are you a Cloud Architect with a specialization in Big Data? Do you have Data Warehousing and/or Hadoop experience? Do you like to solve the most complex and high scale (billion + records) data challenges in the world today? Would you like a career that gives you opportunities to help customers and partners use cloud computing web services to do big new things faster, at lower cost? Do you like to work on-site in a variety of business environments, leading teams through high impact projects using the newest technology? Would you like to gain the deepest customer and partner insights on maximizing the value of cloud computing technologies?  At AWS, we’re hiring highly technical Cloud Architect, Big Data consultants to help our customers migrate to cloud while also help our partners develop technical expertise and capacity. Our consultants will deliver proof-of-concept projects, topical workshops, and lead implementation projects. These professional services engagements will focus on key customer solutions such as, web applications, enterprise applications, HPC, Machine Learning and big data. · Expertise - Collaborate with AWS field business development, marketing, training and support teams to help customers and partners learn and use AWS services such as Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), Amazon Elastic Map Reduce (EMR), Amazon Redshift, , Amazon DynamoDB/RDS databases, AWS SageMaker, AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), etc. · Solutions - Define and deliver on-site technical engagements with customers and partners. This includes participating in on-site visits with prospective customers, understanding customer requirements, and proposing and delivering packaged offerings, and delivering custom solution engagements. · Delivery - Engagements include short on-site projects proving the use of AWS services to support new distributed computing solutions that often span private cloud and public cloud services. Engagements will include migration of existing applications and development of new applications using AWS cloud services. · Insights - Work with AWS engineering and support teams to convey partner and customer needs and feedback as input to technology roadmaps. Share real world implementation challenges and recommend new capabilities that would simplify adoption and drive greater value from use of AWS cloud services.  Basic Qualifications  · Customer facing skills to represent AWS well within the customer’s environment and drive discussions with senior personnel regarding trade-offs, best practices, project management and risk mitigation · Demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges · Highly technical and analytical, possessing 7 or more years of IT implementation experience · Deep hands-on experience leading the design, development and deployment of business software at scale · Deep understanding of database and analytical technologies in the industry including MPP and NoSQL databases, Data Warehouse design, BI reporting and Dashboard development. · Deep understanding of Apache Hadoop 1/2 and the Hadoop ecosystem. Experience with tools such as Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, Oozie, Hue, Zookeeper, HCatalog, Solr, and Avro. · Familiarity with SQL-on-Hadoop technologies such as Hive, Pig, Impala, Spark SQL, and/or Presto. · Proven experience with software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies required · Current hands-on software development experience required; Internet-related business models preferred · Strong verbal and written communications skills and ability to lead effectively across organizations · BS level technical degree required; Computer Science or Math background preferred Fluency in Mandarin and English.
requirement_others: Preferred Qualifications  · Strong track record of implementing AWS services in a variety of distributed computing environments · Integration of AWS cloud services with on-premise technologies from Microsoft, IBM, Oracle, HP, SAP etc. · Proven experience in large scale data warehouse migrations  · Machine Learning experience using SageMaker or similar tools. · Masters degree in Computer Science

company: LINE Taiwan_台灣連線股份有限公司
title: (LTEG) LINE Application Security Engineer
requirement: Application security is a very important part in LINE’s service development. Application security engineers are in charge of the security design of LINE services. They are involved in service architecture design, security module development, and application security review. Application security engineers must be able to perform application security review based on both whitebox and blackbox security testing.   They are also in charge of compiling secure development guidelines for R&D departments, in order to ensure our services are secure and reliable. System security architecture, secure code review, and penetration testing skills are mandatory for this position.  In addition, the application security team is responsible for research, development, and deployment of new security technologies, such as machine learning, biometric authentication, blockchain technologies, IoT security, and encryption module design. Security engineers can do research related to their respective projects or choose to work with the global security team on universally applicable technologies.  [Responsibility]  1. Perform risk assessment for family services -  Perform blackbox and whitebox security assessment for family services. -  Review technical design and provide suggestions to improve the system     security. -  Co-work with global teams to deal with the application security issues.  2. Anti-Abusing -  Analyze account abusing with global anti-abusing team. -  Deal with service abusing cases. -  Help to improve the anti-abusing system.  3. Candidate have to perform at least one of the major jobs mentioned above.  [Qualifications] 1. Required Skills and Qualifications -  Must be familiar with both attack and protection best practices of    OWASP TOP 10. - Must be familiar with Web service security and authentication protocols,    such as, OAuth 2.0, WebAuth SAML, and TLS. - Must be familiar with contemporary encryption technologies, protocols,    and algorithms. - Should be able to write and review Java and Python applications. - Fluent English.  2. Preferred Skills and Qualifications -  Familiar with machine learning or data science. -  Familiar data analysis tools, such as ELK and Hadoop. -  Familiar with modern vulnerability scan tools, such AppScan, WebInspect, BurpSuite and etc. -  Familiar about code review tools, such as Fortify and CheckMarx. -  Japanese or Korean language skill.

title: Software Engineer (Infrastructure)
requirement: At Umbo Computer Vision, the infrastructure engineer is a special position that  helps us improve reliability, performance, efficiency, and scalability of our  services. Infrastructure engineers work with our application engineers  throughout the whole lifecycle of our products – from architecture design and  review, through implementation, to operation. As an infrastructure engineer,  you will gain an in-depth understanding of our systems, and provide insights  into potential failures and continual improvement.  You'll be joining a company full of fellow creative engineers at Umbo CV. We  design cloud-native applications and deliver cutting-edge AI technologies all  atop world-class infrastructure. Our infrastructure team plays a crucial role in  our engineering processes. We are looking for talented engineers who aren't  afraid of taking up the challenges of DevOps and cloud technologies,  processes, and tools to improve our infrastructure and services.   What you'll be doing:  Design and develop internal tools to improve automation, efficiency, and  transparency, such as: CI/CD pipelines, logging, monitoring and alerting for  our micro-services. Help design infrastructures for scalability, reliability, high availability, as well as  good software maintenance and operational experience. Help our developers adopt cloud-native designs. Share operation duties with our engineers. And contribute to incident response and no-blame postmortem analysis and review.  What you'll need:  BS in Computer Science/Engineering or related experiences Ability to work with container technologies like Docker Familiar with one of Python, Golang, and shell scripts Experience with public clouds like AWS or GCP Experience of developing and running applications on a cloud  Pluses:  Experience with Kubernetes CI/CD experience with Jenkins Experience with Packer and Terraform Experience with configuration management such as Ansible and SaltStack Experience with operating GPU workloads on Kubernetes Experience with machine learning tools such as PyTorch and Tensorflow Experience with machine learning pipeline design or implementation

requirement: OK超商認為，用心經營的企業，首重人才培訓。 因此，我們投入了大量的訓練資源，積極培育新一代的第一線管理人才。從門市最基礎的顧客服務、店舖營運管理、店舖形象維護…等學習重點開始，我們透過店舖實作、課堂教學、e-Learning線上課程混成學習，培育您朝區域營業主管邁進，歡迎對流通業經營管理有興趣的朋友，加入我們的行列。 培訓方式：初階訓練－店經理訓練(約3~6個月完成)，直接在分店內實作學習，並配合分店內三班輪班作業。完成訓練後負責1家直營店之經營管理。進階訓練－依店經理實務工作表現，擇優安排區主任訓練。結訓晉升區主任後，負責10~12家店(含加盟店)之輔導管理。區主任每年負責輔導管理約一億營業額。 長期發展規劃－依個人工作表現及職涯發展意願，規劃職務晉升或輪調至總公司服務。
requirement_others: 1.大學畢，科系、經驗不拘，須輪班。 2.須自備交通工具及電腦網路設備(透過e-Learning，隨時學習)。 3.公司提供店舖經營專業訓練，歡迎有志經營便利商店者加入。工作時段：三班輪班輪休制。
address: 桃園市桃園區(需配合輪調)

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

title: HR Assistant Manager
requirement: Due to the growth of our worldwide operations at Lion Travel Group, we are looking for an experienced HR Assistant Manager to strengthen the existing operation team in Tokyo/Japan. You will provide both operational and strategic HR support to the line managers (VP Level) and the employees within your own accounts within the covered region. You will need to be proactive, able to complete a wide variety of tasks and be passionate about adding value to your business partners. You will join our rapidly growing and successful company, in a fast paced role and exciting environment. You will report into the HR VP, based in Taipei, our Headquarter. This is a full-time position, based in Tokyo, Japan. Main responsibilities, including:Business Partnering:1.Maximize people capability and organizational effectiveness through expert consultation and coaching.2.Proactive assessment and identification of people issues and opportunities via solution-oriented data, trend and scenario analysis.Talent Management:1.Guide managers through the annual performance cycle and investment in (internal/external) talent.2.Performance: Reviews, feedback, improvement.3.Development: PICP, training.4.Talent needs: Org review, succession planning.5.Talent acquisition: Active participant in talent selection for all supervisory and above roles.Learning & Development:1.Identify learning needs and facilitate targeted developmental trainings.Employee Relations:1.Manage issue intake, investigation, path to resolution and communication to minimize risk, protect the culture and retain employee trust.Change Management:1.Facilitate organizational change in all aspects from planning, communication and execution. Implement global HR initiatives and ensure that local activities are aligned to the global HR strategy.HR Operations/Compliance:1.Act as project manager and legal advisor on behalf of your account team consisting of HR Specialist, Payroll Specialist and Recruiter in Taipei.
requirement_others: 1.Minimum of 8 years of strategic HR Business Partnering experience in an international company within Japan.2.Regional HR experience is a requirement.3.Previous experience in a fast paced commercial and international environment (preferably travel/airlines/hotel industry).4.Bachelor or Master Degree.5.Excellent communication skills and ability to flex own.6.Proven track record of developing strong relationships and influence a wide range of stakeholders.7.Ability to leverage data and trend analysis to identify issues then advise on path to improvement or solutions.8.Experience coaching and developing new managers.9.Proactive, takes initiative, able to multi-task and prioritize.10.Ambitions, striving for professional development, and proven ability to learn fast.11.Flexible and able to cope well with change.12.Fluent in Japanese and preferably in English.13.Being humble and people oriented. 14.Proficient with local legislation.15.Able to travel within Asia and to HQ in Taiwan (30% of time).

Keeps learning and cultivating the knowledges in project management and offshore technologies; 6.	Works in an intensive English spoken environment plus huge demands of      local communication.

company: 澳洲商艾萊門窗股份有限公司台灣分公司
title: Senior Manufacturing engineer/資深機械工程師
requirement: Report to Global HQ with leadership position along with attractive packages. A senior manufacturing engineer is a leader who works in a company’s manufacturing production operations. They handle the monitoring and maintenance of technical aspects of the manufacturing process, looking at a multiple or variety of metrics gathered throughout the process improvement.   Principal Accountabilities:  1.Coordinate and lead manufacturing process development projects by leveraging woodworking machine industries in Asia. Develops manufacturing processes, process improvements, and provides related technical support.   2.Manage manufacturing related projects and coordinate activities with various internal and external suppliers. Conceive, design, develop and implement new production lines to manufacture wood/timber products.  3.Coordinate system utilization, material flow, and manufacturing processes to improve manufacturing effectiveness for all plant locations.   4.Improve manufacturing lead time through improving material flow in or outside of the manufacturing processes   5.Provide manufacturing department layouts for the purpose of evaluating and recommending alternatives to optimize operating efficiency, material flow, and space utilization.    6.Involves evaluations, recommendations, proposal justification and implementation of the techniques and systems necessary to provide a quality, best-cost manufacturing system in HQ plants.  1. 機器、工具機、發動機、工業廠房及設備之溝通及協調  2. 詳細說明與指導生產及安裝方法  3. 建立管制標準與程序，以確保機器、工具機、發動機、工業廠房、設備之安全及有效運轉  4. 機器、工具機、發動機、工業廠房及設備維修之指導  5. 協助現場施工單位解決問題，並改善施工品質。  6. 跨部門/單位溝通協調及協助解決問題
requirement_others: Job Requirements (include, but are not limited to):  • Bachelor’s Degree in Manufacturing Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Engineering Management or related technical degree. Knowledge of Automation Engineering and/or Robotics Engineering preferred but NOT required.  • MINIMUM of 3 years manufacturing engineering work experience.  • Program/project management experience required: must demonstrate leadership, team work, collaboration, creativity, and innovation.  • Self-motivated with strong written and verbal communication skills; ability to effectively prepare and deliver technical reports and presentations.  • Working knowledge and application of Lean Six Sigma.  • Ability to lead and function in a team environment, while effectively communicating across various levels of the organization.  • Ability to travel in support of job function (plants, customers, suppliers, etc.) Proficient in Chinese and English  • Commercial mechanical assembly experience  • Woodworking experience including laminating with HPL, Horizontal saws, edge processing, edge banding  • CNC router experience  • Solid Works and AutoCAD computer software experience  • PLC programming  • Database development  • Basic Machine shop knowledge  • APICS skills (Materials/Production Control)

title: [KKStream] Data Analyst
requirement: About KKStreamKKStream is a KKBOX branch established in 2016 serving as the foremost video streaming solution provider in Asia. We provide scalable video platforms and enterprise solutions, now applied by companies including au, Japan and KKTV, Taiwan.We constantly monitor and measure our performance to sharpen and improve our work ways. We are proud of our work environment free from discrimination, and also strongly believe the diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees.Job Description,At KKStream, decisions on how to improve product value and service business are driven by data. We are looking for a data analyst to focus on measurement, experiment design, and algorithm implementation to understand how OTT audiences engage and to improve the watching experience of millions of audiences.You will have strong collaboration with analytic partners, domain experts, and other consumers of your work, in supporting an engineering and product function.Responsibility,* Drive complex analytics projects from loosely defined questions to actionable insights.* Design and conduct quantitative analysis for a deep understanding of how the users react to our product and platforms.* Constantly deliver a commentary on the result of online testing of user behavior measurement.Requirement,* Have the ability to condense analysis into actionable insights to inform business decisions and influence; understand business models and high-level strategy.* Possess statistical competence; demonstrated experience with hands-on statistical modeling (such as regression modeling, a/b testing, significance testing etc), knowledge about machine learning (such as predictive modeling, decision trees, classification models, and clustering techniques)* Have the technical competence to perform advanced analytics: coding skills (such as Python, Java, and Scala) and experience performing analysis with large datasets, analytics tools experience (Pandas, R, SQL, or Hadoop)Plus,* Operating experience measuring and visualizing data (Amplitude, Mixpanel, or Firebase)

benefit: 這是一個為研究菁英打造的研發環境，我們的訴求是讓研究人員能在此構築人生理想及技術成就，讓工作與生活兼顧平衡與樂趣。多年來致力於打造讓每位工研人身體健康、工作愉快，進而使家庭幸福快樂的友善職場。 優於法規之多元給假制度  針對不同族群，設計多元且優於法令規定之給假方案，以利員工於工作之餘，得以兼顧各式之需要，如：特別休假、新人彈性預支休假、安胎及育兒假、志工假等。  幸福成家 開發專屬未婚員工的交友網站-『男女拉拉對』，同仁可加入網站會員，與其他會員互動，並可參加定期舉辦的未婚聯誼活動，讓單身同仁有更多管道結交朋友，促成良緣。  幸福安家 關懷女性同仁哺育母乳的需求，特於各院區設置母愛室。為了讓同仁子女得到妥善照顧，設有托嬰中心、幼兒園、及附設安親班。每年舉辦院慶、運動會暨家庭日以及藝文及親子活動，邀同仁與家人共同參與。  悠活館 設有室內溫水游泳池、水療池、蒸氣室、烤箱、兒童池、健身房、羽球場、網球場、桌撞球桌、韻律教室等，讓員工鍛練體魄、紓發壓力、促進健康。  工研餐廳 提供全方位餐點服務，聘有專業之營養師，提供色香味俱全的美食外，更針對食的安全與健康予以嚴格的把關與守護。  「工研人好健康」促進網絡 除了設置醫務室，由醫師排班駐診，給予員工最便利及時的醫療診治，我們更提供不分年齡層每年一次的免費健康檢查、建構全方位照護網－「工研人好健康」，依健康分級給予不同的健康促進方案，達到提昇個人健康善的循環。  諮商室  建置溫馨舒適的諮商環境，由專業心理諮商師提供員工關於身心靈各類問題之免費諮商與輔導。

company: Amazon Web Services Taiwan Limited_台灣亞馬遜網路服務有限公司
title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning - AWS Professional Services
requirement: Data Scientist - Machine Learning AWS Professional Services Location: Taiwan  JOB DESCRIPTION Excited by using massive amounts of data to develop Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) models? Want to help the largest global enterprises derive business value through the adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI)? Eager to learn from many different enterprise’s use cases of AWS ML and DL? Thrilled to be key part of Amazon, who has been investing in Machine Learning for decades, pioneering and shaping the world’s AI technology? At Amazon Web Services (AWS), we are helping large enterprises build ML and DL models on the AWS Cloud. We are applying predictive technology to large volumes of data and against a wide spectrum of problems. Our Professional Services organization works together with our AWS customers to address their business needs using AI.  AWS Professional Services is a unique consulting team. We pride ourselves on being customer obsessed and highly focused on the AI enablement of our customers. If you have experience with AI, including building ML or DL models, we’d like to have you join our team. You will get to work with an innovative company, with great teammates, and have a lot of fun helping our customers.  If you do not live in a market where we have an open Data Scientist position, please feel free to apply. Our Data Scientists can live in any location where we have a Professional Service office.  A successful candidate will be a person who enjoys diving deep into data, doing analysis, discovering root causes, and designing long-term solutions. It will be a person who likes to have fun, loves to learn, and wants to innovate in the world of AI. Major responsibilities include:   Understand the customer’s business need and guide them to a solution using our AWS AI Services, AWS AI Platforms, AWS AI Frameworks, and AWS AI EC2 Instances .  Assist customers by being able to deliver a ML / DL project from beginning to end, including understanding the business need, aggregating data, exploring data, building & validating predictive models, and deploying completed models to deliver business impact to the organization.  Use Deep Learning frameworks like MXNet, Caffe 2, Tensorflow, Theano, CNTK, and Keras to help our customers build DL models.  Use SparkML and Amazon Machine Learning (AML) to help our customers build ML models.  Work with our Professional Services Big Data consultants to analyze, extract, normalize, and label relevant data.  Work with our Professional Services DevOps consultants to help our customers operationalize models after they are built.  Assist customers with identifying model drift and retraining models.  Research and implement novel ML and DL approaches, including using FPGA.
